description.text: A (エー, Ē) was the First Raikage (初代雷影, Shodai Raikage; literally meaning: First Lightning Shadow) and the founder of Kumogakure in the Land of Lightning.
A (エー, Ē, Viz: Ei, English TV: Ay) is the fourth Raikage (四代目雷影, Yondaime Raikage, literally meaning: Fourth Lightning Shadow) of Kumogakure.

A (エー, Ē) was the Second Raikage (二代目雷影, Nidaime Raikage; literally meaning: Second Lightning Shadow) was the leader of Kumogakure during the First Great Shinobi World War. Throughout his reign, worked hard to build peace among the other hidden villages.

A (エー, Ē) was the Third Raikage (三代目雷影, Sandaime Raikage; literally meaning: Third Lightning Shadow) who led Kumogakure thirty years before the Fourth Great Shinobi World War. He was the father of A and adoptive father of Killer B. Known for being the greatest Raikage the village has ever had.
Abiru (アビル, Abiru) is a young student at Sunagakure Academy.

description.html: Aino (アイノ, Aino) was a servant of Tenji, the emperor of the Land of Ancestors. On orders from her emperor, Aino became Kaguya Ōtsutsuki's personal attendant when she first appeared on Earth.

description.text: Ajisai (アジサイ, Ajisai) was a Chūnin-ranked ninja from Amegakure who would later be the replacement to Nagato's First Animal Path Corps.
Akaboshi (アカボシ, Akaboshi) is a member of Team Magaki, who aims to steal the Kinjutsu of the Tsuchigumo Clan.

description.html: He is the father of Akane and a bridge builder. He was also a friend of Kaiza.

description.html: Akari Tatsushiro (龍代アカリ, Tatsushiro Akari) is a young girl that appears in the Naruto Shippūden: Dragon Blade Chronicles.

description.text: Akatsuchi (curadツチ) is an Iwagakure shinobi. A point of war-experienced pride for Iwagakure, Akatsuchi's unwavering loyalty to the Third Tsuchikage earned him the title as his 'shield'.
Akemaru (朱丸, Akemaru) is a ninken of Konohagakure's Inuzuka clan.
description.html: Akemaru (朱丸, Akemaru) is a ninken from Konohagakure's Inuzuka clan.

description.text: Akino (アキま) is a ninken and a personal summons from Kakashi Hatake.
Akio (アキオ) is Todoroki's younger brother.
Akita Inuzuka (⁇アキタ, Inuzuka Akita) is a member of Konohagakure's Inuzuka Clan and a lead scientist for the Ninja Weapons Science Team.
Akkun (アックン, Akkun) was an Akuta.
Amachi (アマチ) is a medical ninja and scientist who was Orochimaru's accomplice.

Amado Sanzu (三アマド, Sanzu Amado) is a former intern of the Kara organization and was the head of its research division and development. He has since defected to Konohagakure, where he used a mixture of bluffs and gifts to obtain official citizenship for the protection of the Seventh Hokage.
description.html: Amado (アマド, Amado) is an Inner from the organisation Kara.

description.text: Amagi (アマギ) is a chūnin of Sunagakure, directly under the supervision of Kankurō since he turned 15.
Amai (アマイ) is a medical ninja from Kumogakure.
Amaru (アマル) is a medical apprentice, originally from a town of the Land of Fire.
Amayo (アマヨ) is the ex-wife of Michiru Tsuki and the mother of Hikaru Tsuki.
description.html: Amayo (アマヨ, Amayo) is the ex-wife of Michiru Tsuki and the mother of Hikaru Tsuki.

description.text: Ameno (アメノ) is a kunoichi from Sunagakure and teammate of Kōji and Shishio.
Ameyuki (飴雪, Ameyuki) is a young kunoichi who appears in the Hidden Legend of Akatsuki: Evil Flowers in Full Bloom.
Ameyuri Ringo (林檎雨由利, Ringo Ameyuri) was a kunoichi from Kirigakure and one of the members of the previous generation of the Seven Ninja Swordsmen of the Mist.
Ami (アミ) is a former student of Konohagakure Academy.
description.html: Ami (アミ, Ami) is a former academy student of Konohagakure.

description.text: Amino (アミノ) was a villager from Bamboo Village and daughter of Iō.
description.html: Amino (アミノ, Amino) was a villager from the Bamboo Village and a daughter of Iō.

description.text: Amuda (アムダ, Amuda) Amuda was a former member of the Enlightenment Group during the Sasuke Shinden arc, which was released after the Fourth Shinobi World War. He is only mentioned in the novel Sasuke Shinden: Book of Sunrise, not in the anime. 'Sasuke Shinden: Book of Sunrise' is a light novel in the 'Naruto' series, specifically part of the 'Shinden Series.' It was written by Shin Towada.
description.html: Amuda (アムダ, Amuda) was once a member of the Lightning Group.

description.text: This shinobi is apparently the Anbu commander of Konohagakure.
Aniki (兄貴) is a member of the Moya Triad.
Anko Mitarashi (みたらし アンコ, Mitarashi Anko ) is a tokubetsu jōnin from Konohagakure and a former student of Orochimaru. She currently serves as a teacher at the Academy.

Ao (青) was a former Anbu of the Kirigakure Hunter-nin Corps, who He served as the Fifth Mizukage's right-hand man. For his services, he was considered a hero of his village, before retiring and secretly working as an Outsider for Kara.

Aoba Yamashiro (山城アオバ, Yamashiro Aoba) is a tokubetsu jōnin from Konohagakure. Aoi (あおい, Aoi) is a young girl who appears in Naruto Shippūden: Ultimate Ninja 4 and makes a cameo appearance in Naruto Shippūden: Ultimate Ninja 5 and Naruto Shippūden: Ultimate Ninja Storm 2.
Aoda (アオダ) es una serpiente invocadora que reside en la cueva Ryūchi y que ha prometido lealtad a Sasuke Uchiha.
description.html: Aoda (アオダ, Aoda) is a summoning snake who resides in the Ryūchi Cave, that has pledged loyalty to Sasuke Uchiha.

description.text: Aoi (あおい, Aoi) es una joven que aparece en Naruto Shippūden: Ultimate Ninja 4 y hace un cameo en Naruto Shippūden: Ultimate Ninja 5 y en Naruto Shippūden: Ultimate Ninja Storm 2.
description.html: Aoi (あおい, Aoi) is a young girl that appears in Naruto Shippūden: Ultimate Ninja 4, and makes a cameo in Naruto Shippūden: Ultimate Ninja 5 and in Naruto Shippūden: Ultimate Ninja Storm 2.

description.text: Aoi Rokushō (緑青アオイ, Rokushō Aoi) was a jōnin from Amegakure and a missing ninja from Konohagakure.
Aoneko (アオネコ) is a recruitable character in Naruto: Ultimate Ninja Online.
description.html: Aoneko (アオネコ, Aoneko) is a recruitable character in Naruto: Ultimate Ninja Online.

description.text: Arashi (アラシ) was the hope of the Fūma clan shinobi who tried to rebuild their clan.
Arashi Umeya (梅矢アラシ, Umeya Arashi) is a shinobi from Sunagakure.
Araya (アラヤ, Araya) is a Genin of Sunagakure who is a member of Team Shinki.
Armadiko is a giant armadillo who lives on Turtle Island.
description.html: Armadiko (アルマジ子, Arumajiko) is a giant armadillo living on the Island Turtle.

description.text: Ashimaru (葦丸, Ashimaru) is a shinobi who attacked the Green Rice Village.
Ashina (アシナ) is a former actress of the Konoha Film Studio.
description.html: Ashina (アシナ, Ashina) is a former actress of the Konoha Film Studio.

description.text: Ashina Uzumaki (うずまきアシナ, Uzumaki Ashina) was a Shinobi of Uzushiogakure and the leader of the Uzumaki clan during the time of the founding of Konohagakure.
Ashitaba (アシタバ, Ashitaba) was an inhabitant of a village of Jiraiya's novel during Tsunade's Infinite Tsukuyomi dream.
description.html: Ashitaba (アシタバ, Ashitaba) was a character from Jiraiya's novel, who appeared in Tsunade's Infinite Tsukuyomi dream.

description.text: Asuma Sarutobi (猿飛アスマ, Sarutobi Asuma) was the son of the late Third Hokage and uncle of Konohamaru. He was the jōnin leader of Team 10, composed of Shikamaru Nara, Chōji Akimichi, and Ino Yamanaka, and was formerly a member of The 12 Ninja Guardians.
This man was a shinobi that Jiraiya met during his journey to find his disciple.

Asura Ōtsutsuki (大筒木アシュラ, Ōtsutsuki Ashura) was the youngest son and true heir of the Sage of the Six Paths, and was also the creator of the Will of Fire, a custom that their descendants followed. He is the ancestor of the Senju Clan and the Uzumaki Clan.
Atsui (アツイ, Atsui) is a Kumogakure shinobi and Samui's brother. She was part of the First Division of the Great Shinobi Alliance during the Fourth Shinobi World War.

Ayame (アヤメ, Ayame) is the waitress at Ichiraku Ramen, the restaurant of her father, Teuchi, the place Naruto's favorite to eat in Konoha. She and her father seem to be some of the few Konoha villagers who did not treat Naruto in a hostile manner, in fact, they consider him their favorite client.
description.html: Ayame (アヤメ, Ayame) is a waitress at her father's restaurant, Ramen Ichiraku.

description.text: Azami (アザミ, Azami) is the granddaughter by Master Chen.
description.html: Azami (アザミ, Azami) is the granddaughter of Chen.

description.text: Azure Fang (苍蓝之牙) is a ninja from Konohagakure and one of the playable characters in Naruto: Ultimate Ninja Online.
Baiu (バイウ) He was a genin of Amegakure.
Baji (バジ, Baji) was the leader of a gang of thieves.

Baki (バキ, Baki) is a Jōnin who was the sensei of Gaara, Temari, and Kankurō. It was he who killed Hayate Gekko and leader of the Sand troops with the intentions to destroy Konoha in the second part in a member of the suna council.
Baku (貘, Baku) was the invocation Danzō Shimura's staff.
description.html: The Baku (貘, baku) is the former personal summon of Danzō Shimura.

description.text: Baku (バク, Baku) was a member of the ANBU, working directly under the supervision of the Second Hokage. He was one of the ANBU who were ordered to monitor the Uchiha Clan to prevent it from being revealed again. Baku is probably not his real name, but a code name.
description.html: Baku (バク, Baku) was a member of Konohagakure's Anbu.

description.html: Bakuto (バクト, Bakuto) was a prisoner at Orochimaru's Southern Hideout.

Banna (バンナ, Banna) is a citizen of the Land of Water.
Bansai (板斎, Bansai) is an elderly ninja monk of the Temple of Water. Fire and one of the three known survivors of the Akatsuki attack on the temple.
description.html: Bansai (板斎, Bansai) is an elder ninja monk in the Fire Temple as well as the Head Monk of the temple.

description.text: Baraki (バラキ, Baraki) was the leader of a group called 'The Deceased' (亡, Bō) and who It is listed in the Konohagakure Bingo Book. The group was at some point absorbed by another organization in which Baraki did not have much influence.
description.html: Baraki (バラキ, Baraki) was the leader of a group called "The Deceased" (亡, Bō) who is listed in Konohagakure's bingo book.

description.text: Baru Uchiha (うちは バーか, Uchiha Baru) fue un shinobi de Konohagakure perteneciente al Clan Uchiha.

This individual known around Sora-ku only as the Beekeeper is one of the few suppliers of mead. Due to the swarm of bees surrounding their body, the bee-themed Anbu mask they wear, and their androgynous voice, their gender is unknown.

description.html: Bekkō (ベッコウ, Bekkō) is a chūnin from Konohagakure.

(猿飛ビワコ, Sarutobi Biwako) He was a medical-nin of Konohagakure's Sarutobi clan. She was the wife of Hiruzen Sarutobi and mother of Asuma Sarutobi.
description.html: Biwako Sarutobi (猿飛ビワコ, Sarutobi Biwako) was a medical-nin from Konohagakure's Sarutobi clan, and the wife of the Third Hokage, Hiruzen Sarutobi.

description.text: Black Shadow (影法師, Kagebōshi) was a demon from the Treefelling Village who appeared in Naruto Shippuden: Ultimate Ninja 4.

Black Zetsu (黒ゼツ, Kuro Zetsu) It is the physical manifestation of Kaguya Ōtsutsuki's will. Having been created to ensure the revival of his creator, he secretly instigated many events that shaped the shinobi world, during which he impersonated the manifest will of Madara Uchiha, leading him to partner with White Zetsu to become the half of Akatsuki member simply known. as Zetsu (ゼツ, Zetsu).
Blue B (ブルービー, Burūbī) was a shinobi of Kumogakure and jinchūriki of Gyūki before Killer B. In the anime, he was resurrected by Kabuto Yakushi to fight in the Fourth Shinobi World War.
He is an Anbu captain from Konohagakure.
Boro (ボロ, Boro) was one of the «Internals» (内陣インナー, Innā) of the Kara organization and the leader of a cult.
description.html: Boro (ボロ, Boro) is an Inner from the organisation Kara.

description.text: Boruto Uzumaki (うずまきボルト, Uzumaki Boruto) is the protagonist of the manga and anime Boruto: Naruto Next Generations. He is an inhabitant of Konohagakure, a member of the Uzumaki Clan and a direct descendant of the Hyūga Clan on his maternal side, son of the Seventh Hokage, Naruto Uzumaki and Hinata Hyūga, as well as the older brother of Himawari Uzumaki. He is currently a Genin who is part of Team Konohamaru alongside Sarada Uchiha and Mitsuki. Although he initially resented his father for not spending time with his family due to his position as Hokage, Boruto eventually reconciled with him and began to respect him, also making it his goal to become like his teacher, Sasuke Uchiha, a support for his father. the Hokage and the village.
They are two kangaroos, one adult and the other joey, who were part of Condor's ninja animal team.
Breeze Dancer (疾风舞者) is a ninja from Konohagakure and one of the playable characters in Naruto: Ultimate Ninja Online.
Bull (ブル, Buru) is a ninken and a personal summon of Kakashi Hatake.
Buna (ブナ, Buna) is Shimeji's apprentice. His goal is to be the best gardener in the world.
description.html: Buna (ブナ, Buna) is a young citizen of the Land of Fire.

description.text: Bunpuku (分福, Bunpuku) was a priest of Sunagakure and the first Jinchūriki of Shukaku.
Buntan Kurosuki (黒鋤文淡, Kurosuki Buntan) is a kunoichi from Kirigakure and one of the New Ones: Seven Ninja Swordsmen. team with Kazami and Muyami.
Bunzō (ブンゾウ, Bunzō) es un usurero de la Banda Akagi.
Burami (カザミ, Burami) es un Genin de Kusagakure, que hace equipo con Kazami y Muyami.

Byakuren (白連, Byakuren) was the First Mizukage (初代雷影, Shodai Mizukage; literally 'First Shadow of Water') and the founder of Kirigakure in the Land of Water.
C (シー, Shī) is a Jōnin from the Hidden Cloud Village. Raikage's escort at the Kage meeting and was part of the Sensor Division in the Great Shinobi Alliance.
He was the captain of 'The Ghost Ship'.

description.text: Chamaru (茶丸, Chamaru) is a ninken belonging to the Inuzuka Clan of Konohagakure and the companion of Akita Inuzuka.

Chamū (チャムー, Chamū), according to the film he is a Siberian Tiger despite having the appearance of a Saber-Tooth Tiger and a trained circus animal, appearing in Naruto Movie 3: The Big Excitement! Animal panic on Moon Island. He is also Hikaru Tsuki's friend. In the movie, Naruto gets angry at Hikaru for not taking care of Chamū.
description.html: Chamū (チャムー, Chamū) is a trained circus animal from the circus that Michiru purchases.

description.text: Chen (チェン, Chen), or also known as Master Chen, was a legendary taijutsu master from Konohagakure. He was revived for the Fourth Shinobi World War by Kabuto Yakushi.
Chibi (チビ, Chibi) was a stray dog that Nagato found while wandering the streets after his parents were killed.
description.html: Chibi (チビ, Chibi) was an abandoned dog that Nagato found while wandering around the streets after his parents were killed.

description.text: Chichiatsu (Chichiatsu) is the daimyō of the Swamp Country. Anko Mitarashi was hired to protect this daimyō during one of his many journeys.
description.html: Chichiatsu is the daimyō of the Land of Swamps.

description.text: Chikara (チカラ, Chikara) is the Daimyō of Noodle Country.
description.html: Chikara (チカラ, Chikara) is the current daimyō of the Land of Noodles.

description.text: Chino (血之, Chino) is a member of the Chinoike Clan and a user of the Ketsuryūgan.
Chiriku (地陸, Chiriku) was one of the Twelve Ninja Guardians , who was hired to protect the Daimyo of the Fire Country. There was a reward for him of about 30
Chishima (チシマ, Chishima) He is the assistant to the chief advisor of the Daimyo of the Land of Birds and a childhood friend by Sagi and Toki.
description.html: Chishima (チシマ, Chishima) is the assistant of the Chief Advisor to the Daimyō of the Land of Birds and a childhood friend of Sagi and Toki.

description.text: Chiyo (チヨ, Chiyo) was an elderly and powerful jōnin retired from Sunagakure and a famous puppeteer. Chiyo was also the paternal grandmother of Akatsuki member Sasori of the Red Sand. She was the one who sealed Shukaku inside Gaara.
description.html: The list of authors can be seen in the page history there.

description.text: Chiyo (千代, Chiyo) is the daughter of the daimyō of the Land of this.
description.html: Chiyo (千代, Chiyo) is the daughter of the daimyō of the Land of This.

description.text: Chiyomatsu (チヨマツ, Chiyomatsu) is one of the Samurai of the Land of Iron.
Chōbee Akimichi (秋道チョウベエ, Akimichi Chōbee) is the older brother of Chōza Akimichi and an inhabitant of Konohagakure and a member of the Akimichi Clan.

Chōchō Akimichi (秋道蝶々, Akimichi Chōchō) is a Genin of Konohagakure, a member of the Akimichi clan, and daughter of Chōji Akimichi and Karui. He is part of Team 10 along with Inojin Yamanaka and Shikadai Nara.
Chōhan (チョウハン, Chōhan) is a gambler who lives in the Country of Fire.
description.html: Chōhan (チョウハン, Chōhan) is a gambler from the Land of Fire.

description.text: Chōji Akimichi (秋道チョウジ, Akimichi Chōji) is one of the main supporting characters of the series. He is a Jōnin-level shinobi from Konoha, the Akimichi Clan, and a member of Team Asuma. Along with his teammates Shikamaru Nara and Ino Yamanaka, Chōji is a member of the new generation of Ino-Shika-Chō, just as his parents were before them. After the Fourth World War Shinobi married Karui and they had a daughter who was named Chōchō Akimichi.
she is a citizen of Konohagakure, mother of Chōji Akimichi and wife of Chōza Akimichi. She is also a member of the Allied Mothers Force.
description.html: She is a citizen of Konohagakure, the mother of Chōji Akimichi, and the wife of Chōza Akimichi. She is also a member of the Allied Mothers Force.

description.text: Chōjūrō (長十郎, Chōjūrō) is the Sixth Mizukage (六代目水影, Rokudaime Mizukage, meaning 'Sixth Shadow of Water'). He is one of the Seven Ninja Swordsmen of the Mist, wielder of the double-handled sword called Hiramekarei.

Chōmei (重明, Chōmei) also known as the Seven Tails (七尾, Nanabi, Shichibi) is one of the nine Tailed Beasts created by the Sage of the Six Paths from the Ten Tails and which, prior to its extraction by Akatsuki, was sealed within Fū, a kunoichi of Takigakure.
Chōseki (チョウセキ, Chōseki) is a gangster, criminal, and a former ninja.
description.html: Chōseki (チョウセキ, Chōseki) is a missing-nin from Iwagakure, formerly holding the rank of chūnin.

description.text: Chōza Akimichi (秋道チョザ, Akimichi Chōza) is the father of Chōji Akimichi, and the fifteenth leader of the Akimichi Clan. . Like his son, he is a member of an Ino-Shika-Chō trio along with Shikaku Nara and Inoichi Yamanaka, the parents of his son's classmates. He enjoys eating large amounts of food. He was part of the First Division in the Fourth Shinobi World War.
Chūji (忠治, Chūji) is a giant penguin that lives on Turtle Island.
Chūkaku (中覚, Chūkaku) was a Ninja Monk of the Fire Temple. He was resurrected by Kabuto Yakushi for the Fourth Shinobi World War.
Chūkichi (中吉, Chūkichi) was a famous shinobi of Kirigakure during his time. He was resurrected by Kabuto Yakushi to fight in the Fourth Shinobi World War.
Chūshin (チュウシン, Chūshin) is a member of Team Magaki, who aim to search for the Kinjutsu of the Tsuchigumo Clan.
The anonymous daimyō of the Land of Claws sent a message of peace to the Fang Daimyō when their two countries were on the brink of war.
description.html: The unnamed daimyō of the Land of Claws sent a peace message to the Fang Daimyō when their two countries were close to war.

description.text: Code (コード, Kōdo) is one of the «Internals» (内陣インナー, Innā) of the Kara organization and the failed vessel of Isshiki Ōtsutsuki.
description.html: Code (コード, Kōdo) is an Inner from the organisation Kara.

description.text: The Conch King (貝螺王, Baira Ō) was a Kandachi invocation. The Conch King and Kandachi were defeated by Naruto Uzumaki's Great Ball Rasengan.

Condor (コンドル, Kondoru) in his debut, is an ostrich that Team 7 had to return to the his house Some time after his return home, he ran away again and trained himself to become a ninja ostrich and learn to speak. Since then, he considered Naruto Uzumaki as his rival who prevented his freedom.
Crimson Fist (赤色岩拳) is a ninja from Konohagakure and one of the playable characters in Naruto: Ultimate Ninja Online.

The Curse Jutsu Master is a mysterious ninja that Naruto Uzumaki meets in the story mode of Naruto Shippūden: Ultimate Ninja Storm 2. Kakashi Hatake refers to him as one of the unique individuals who can instill his chakra into dolls.
The Cursed Warrior (白き呪いの武者, Shiroki Noroi Musha) was a ghost samurai who supposedly came from the Land of Birds.
description.html: The Cursed Warrior (白き呪いの武者, Shiroki Noroi Musha) was a ghostly samurai who supposedly came from the Land of Birds.

description.text: Daen Nara (奈良ダエン, Nara Daen) is a shinobi from Konohagakure, a member of the Nara Clan. He was part of the Great Shinobi Alliance during the Fourth Shinobi World War.
Daibutsu (大仏, Daibutsu) was one of the first members to be part of the Akatsuki organization.
Daichi (ダイチ, Daichi) is a genin from Konoha.
description.html: Daichi (ダイチ, Daichi) is a former academy student of Konohagakure.

description.text: Daikoku Funeno (ふねのダイコク, Funeno Daikoku) is a Chūnin-ranked shinobi who serves as a teacher at the academy in Konohagakure. .
description.html: Daikoku Funeno (ふねのダイコク, Funeno Daikoku) is a chūnin of Konohagakure where he serves as a teacher at the Academy.

description.text: Daimaru (ダイマル, Daimaru) was a Ninja from Sunagakure. He was resurrected by Kabuto Yakushi for the Fourth Shinobi World War.
Dajimu (ダジム, Dajimu) is an ANBU member of the Konohagakure Root organization.
description.html: Dajimu (ダジム, Dajimu) is a former member of Konohagakure's Anbu faction Root.

description.text: Dan Katō (加藤ダン, Katō Dan) was Shizune's uncle and Tsunade's boyfriend. Like Nawaki and Naruto, he had the dream of being Hokage.
Dango Mitsuki (観月ダンゴ, Mitsuki Dango) es un shinobi de Konohagakure, miembro del Escuadrón de Reconocimiento e Infiltración.
description.html: Dango Mitsuki (観月ダンゴ, Mitsuki Dango) is a chūnin of Konohagakure.

description.text: Dangō (ダンゴウ, Dangō) is a shinobi from Konohagakure, who works as an advisor to the Daimyō of the Fire Country.
description.html: Dangō (ダンゴウ, Dangō) is a citizen of the Land of Fire.

description.text: Danzō Shimura (志村ダンゾウ,Shimura Danzō) was the unofficial ANBU leader named 'Root'. He was later named as the Sixth Hokage Candidate (六代目火影候补, Rokudaime Hokage Kōho) after Pain's invasion. He was also one of the elders involved in the Uchiha Clan Massacre.
Daore Dōtonbori (道噸堀ダオレ, Dōtonbori Daore) is a competitive eater and member of Exploding Until You Eat.

Darui (ダルイ Darui) is the Fifth Raikage (五代目雷影, Godaime Raikage; literally means 'Fifth Lightning Shadow') of Kumogakure. He was previously the Fourth Raikage's right-hand man and the captain of the First Division of the Great Shinobi Alliance.
Datsuji is a Genin from Sunagakure who teams up with Goji.
Deidara (デイダラ, Deidara) was a member of the Akatsuki organization. He wore the 'Blue' ring (青, Ao), on his right index finger. His companion was Obito Uchiha, although, formerly, it was Sasori.

Delta (デルタ, Deruta) fue una de los «Internos» (内陣インナー, Innā) de la organización Kara. Después de su desactivación inicial y la deserción de Amado a Konohagakure, reprogramaría a Delta para que fuese un arma que pudiera defender Konoha. Creada a raíz del fallecimiento de Akebi Sanzu por su padre Amado Sanzu.
The Demonic Statue of the Outer Path (外道魔像, Gedō Mazō) is the empty shell of the Ten-Tails, and a personal invocation of the Rinnegan used by Madara, Nagato and Obito Uchiha.
Dengaku (デンガク, Dengaku) is the owner of a small oden shop in the Tanzaku Barracks.
description.html: Dengaku (デンガク, Dengaku) owns a small oden stall in Tanzaku Quarters. Jiraiya and Tsunade frequently go there for drinks while they are in town.

description.text: Denka (デンカ, Denka) is a ninja cat who lives with Nekobaa in an Uchiha supply base. Suigetsu mistakes him for a Tanuki. His senses are acute, and he was able to sense Sasuke's chakra despite spending years apart.
description.html: Denka (デンカ, Denka) is a ninneko that lives with Nekobaa at an Uchiha supply base.

description.text: Denki Kaminarimon (雷門デンキ, Kaminarimon Denki) is a Chūnin of Konohagakure and heir to the Kaminarimon Company. He is part of Team 5 alongside Metal Lee and Iwabee Yuino.
Ereki Kaminarimon (雷門エレキ, Kaminarimon Ereki) is the president of the Kaminarimon Company and the father of Denki Kaminarimon. He was once a shinobi of Konohagakure.
description.html: He's the president of the Kaminarimon Company and a former Konohagakure shinobi.

description.text: Disonasu (ディソナス) was the leader of Hachō Village, as well as the person responsible for the destruction of Tonika Village and an ally of Kabuto Yakushi.
Dodai (ドダイ, Dodai) is a shinobi from Kumogakure, he was part of the Fourth Division of the Great Shinobi Alliance during the Fourth Shinobi World War.
Dokan (ドカン) is a genin from Konohagakure. He was a student at the academy during the time Itachi Uchiha attended his first year at the academy.
description.html: Dokan (ドカン, Dokan) is a genin of Konohagakure. He was an academy student during the time Itachi Uchiha attended his first year at the academy.

description.text: The Doki (怒鬼, Doki; literally means Angry Demons) are three gigantic demons in human form that are summoned by Tayuya. Each one has their mouth, ears and eyes covered, referring to the three wise monkeys. Tayuya, Through his flute, he is able to send melodies that allow him to control the three demons, who perform different actions depending on the notes.
Dokku (ドック, Dokku) is a citizen of Tonika Town.
Don (ドン, Don) is a giant koala who lives on Turtle Island.
Dosu Kinuta (ドス・キヌタ, Dosu Kinuta) was a ninja from Otogakure who was the unofficial leader of Team Dosu, as his group was officially controlled by Orochimaru.

Dotō Kazahana (風花ドトウ, Kazahana Dotō) was the leader of the Country of Snow, and was the main antagonist of the film Naruto: The Rescue of the Snow Princess. He is the uncle of Koyuki Kazahana and brother of Sosetsu Kazahana.
The Dread Lion (ドレッドライオン, Doreddoraion) is a giant lion whose pawprint was collected by Itachi and Sasuke Uchiha for their Paw Encyclopaedia.
description.html: The Dread Lion (ドレッドライオン, Doreddoraion) is a giant lion whose pawprint was collected by Itachi and Sasuke Uchiha for their Paw Encyclopaedia.

description.text: Doshin (ドシン, Doshin) was a Ninja who appeared in Naruto Shippūden: Ultimate Ninja Heroes 3, who served under Shinga.
Dōshu Goetsu (呉越ドウシュ, Goetsu Dōshu ) is a Genin from Konohagakure. He is part of Team 40 along with Tsuru Itoi and Enko Onikuma.
Dōtō Akimichi (秋道ドウトウ, Akimichi Dōtō) is one of the members of the Akimichi Clan.
It is an Anbu from Konohagakure.

data.title: Daimyō del País de la Tierra

description.text: The Daimyō of the Earth Country is the leader of the Earth Country.
description.html: He is the former daimyō of the Land of Earth.

description.text: The Earth Prison Golem (土牢剛霊無, Dorō Gōremu) is Jirōbō's personal summon.
description.html: This Earth Prison Golem (土牢剛霊無, Dorō Gōremu) was the personal summon of Jirōbō of the Sound Four.

description.text: Ebisu (エビス, Ebisu) is a Tokubetsu Jōnin of Konoha who specializes in the private training of elite ninja, as stated by Kakashi Hatake. He is also the leader of Team Ebisu, which is composed of: Konohamaru Sarutobi, Udon and Moegi. jiisama) by the villagers of the hidden sand village. He and his late older sister, Chiyo, are highly revered in Sunagakure, and were known as the Honorable Brothers (御姊弟, Gokyōdai). He is the paternal great-uncle of the late Akatsuki member Sasori.

Ebizō (エビゾウ, Ebizō) se le llama 'Honrado abuelo Ebizō' (エビゾウジイ 様, Ebizō-jiisama) por los aldeanos de la villa oculta de la arena. Él y su difunta hermana mayor, Chiyo, son muy venerados en Sunagakure, y fueron conocidos como los Hermanos Honorables (御 姊弟, Gokyōdai). Es tío-abuelo paterno del fallecido miembro de Akatsuki, Sasori.
Emi (エミ, Emi) is a tailor shop worker in the Country of Fire.
description.html: Emi (エミ, Emi) is a young woman from the Land of Fire.

description.text: Emina (エミナ, Emina) is a traveler and granddaughter of Kahiko, leader of a traveling caravan.
description.html: Emina (エミナ, Emina) is a traveler appearing in a caravan in Naruto the Movie: Legend of the Stone of Gelel.

description.text: Emiru (エミル, Emiru) is a tourist who enjoys hot springs and travel.
description.html: Emiru (エミル, Emiru) is a young girl from the Land of Fire.

description.text: En no Gyōja (役の行者, En no Gyōja) was the leader of the Tsuchigumo Clan and Hotaru's grandfather.
En Oyashiro (御屋城エン, Oyashiro En) is a Medical Ninja and a Kekkei Genkai collector. After the death of his wife, he killed his clan, leaving only his daughter alive.
Enchū Nara (奈良エンチュウ, Nara Enchū) is one of the elders of the Nara Clan.
description.html: Enchū Nara (奈良エンチュウ, Nara Enchū) is an elder adviser for the Nara clan.

description.text: Enko Onikuma (鬼熊えんこ, Onikuma Enko) is a Genin of Konohagakure. She is part of Team 40 along with Tsuru Itoi and Dōshu Goetsu.
Ensui Nara (奈良エンスイ, Nara Ensui) is a Konohagakure shinobi member of the Nara Clan. He was part of the Third Division of the Allied Shinobi Forces during the Fourth Shinobi World War.
Enzo Tenrō (天狼エンゾ, Tenrō Enzo) is the leader of Yumegakure and the father of Ryuka Tenrō.
Erimaki Sharo (斜路エリマ キ, Sharo Erimaki) is a kunoichi from Iwagakure.
description.html: Erimaki Sharo (斜路エリマキ, Sharo Erimaki) is a kunoichi from Iwagakure.

description.text: Etoro Konjiki (金色エトロ, Konjiki Etoro) was a terrorist from Ishigakure and twin brother of Metoro Kin'iro. They specialized in the destruction of buildings and merchant ships.

data.title: Evil Minister of the Tea Daimyō

description.text: He was the daimyō's minister in the Land of Tea.
description.html: He was the minister of the daimyō in the Land of Tea.

description.text: F (エフ, Efu) was a shinobi known for Killer B of Kumogakure who was attacked by Zetsu and possessed for the Fourth Shinobi World War.
description.html: F (エフ, Efu, Viz: Eff) is a Kumogakure shinobi.

description.text: The Daimyō of the Fang Country is the leader of the Fang Country.
description.html: The unnamed daimyō of the Land of Fangs was sent a peace message by the Claw Daimyō when their two countries were close to a war.

description.text: Fuzz (ファズ, Fazu) is a young citizen of Tonika Village.
description.html: Faz (ファズ, Fazu) is a young citizen of the Tonika Village.

description.text: He is the former daimyō of the Land of Fire.
description.html: He is the former daimyō of the Land of Fire.

description.text: The First Animal Path Corps was a ninja who fought against Jiraiya during his journey in search of his disciple. His body was used years later by Nagato as his first Animal Path.
The First Hoshikage (初代星影, Shodai Hoshikage; Literally 'First Star Shadow') was the founder of Hoshigakure, two hundred years old. before the beginning of the Series.
description.html: He was the First Hoshikage (初代星影, Shodai Hoshikage, Literally meaning: First or Founding Star Shadow), and founder of Hoshigakure.

data.title: Ex líder de la aldea Nadeshiko

description.text: She is Shizuka's mother and former leader of Nadeshiko Village.
She is an Anbu from Konohagakure.
The Daimyō of the Frozen Country (霜の国大名, Shimo no Kuni Daimyō) is the leader and owner of the country of the same name.
description.html: He is the daimyō of the Land of Frost.

description.text: Fubuki Kakuyoku (鶴翼フブキ, Kakuyoku Fubuki) was a kunoichi of the Hidden Snow Village, which appears in the first Naruto movie.
Fudō (フドウ, Fudō) was a shinobi who was part of the group that stole the bodies of the 12 Ninja Guardians. He represents brute strength in the team, and is generally kind to Fuen.

Fuen (フエン, Fuen) was a kunoichi who was part of the team led by Furido that was responsible for stealing four corpses. of the 12 Ninja Guardians with the objective of invading Konoha and finishing off the Hokage. Fuen was the group's main strategist and trap expert.
Fugai (フガイ) was one of the Knights of Haido who sought to build a 'utopia'.
Fugaku Uchiha (うちはフガク, Uchiha Fugaku) was the leader of the Uchiha Clan, as well as the Konoha Military Police, husband of Mikoto Uchiha, and the father of Itachi Uchiha and Sasuke Uchiha.
Fugi (フギ, Fugi) was a shinobi from Sunagakure.

Fuguki Suikazan (西瓜山河豚鬼, Suikazan Fuguki) was a high-ranking ninja from Kirigakure, who was also a member of the strongest generation of the Seven Ninja Swordsmen of the Mist, being the original possessor of Samehada. He was Kisame Hoshigaki's superior and mentor.
Fukasaku (フカサク, Fukasaku) is one of the Two Great Toad Sages of Mount Myōboku. He was Jiraiya's teacher and, later, Naruto, teaching them how to use Sage Mode.
Fuki (フキ, Fuki) is a student at the Konoha Ninja Academy.
description.html: Fuki (フキ, Fuki) is a former academy student of Konohagakure.

description.text: Fuki (フキ, Fuki) is a little girl who lives in the village of Ran, in the Country of Rice Fields.
description.html: Fuki (フキ, Fuki) is a little girl who lives in the Land of Rice Fields.

description.text: Fuku (ふく, Fuku) is a beautiful princess of the Country of Noodles.
description.html: Fuku (ふく, Fuku, English TV: Princess Fortune) is the daughter of a rich daimyō. She later got engaged to the daimyō of the Land of Noodles, Chikara.

description.text: Fukuemon (フクエモン, Fukuemon) is an owl and the personal summon of Motoi.
description.html: Fukuemon (フクエモン, Fukuemon) is an owl summoned by Motoi.

description.text: Fukurokumaru is an animal summon and a playable character in Naruto : Ultimate Ninja Online.
description.html: Fukurokumaru (Fukurokumaru) is a summon animal and playable character in Naruto: Ultimate Ninja Online.

description.text: Fukusuke Hikyakuya (飛脚屋フクスケ, Hikyakuya Fukusuke) is hired to be the Wagarashi family's runner for the Todoroki Shrine race in Tea Country.
description.html: Fukusuke Hikyakuya (飛脚屋フクスケ, Hikyakuya Fukusuke) is hired to be the Wagarashi family's runner for the Todoroki Shrine Race in the Land of Tea.

description.text: Fukuyokana (ふくよかな) was a bandit alongside his brother.
description.html: Fukuyokana (ふくよかな, Fukuyokana) was a bandit alongside his brother.

description.text: Funari (フナリ, Funari) was a subordinate of Kakuzu. This guarded the refuge of the bankers of Kakuzu, Ginji and Kyōya. He was attacked by Suigetsu in his search for information about Akatsuki.
Furofuki (フロフキ, Furofuki) is a Medical Ninja from Konoha.
description.html: Furofuki (フロフキ, Furofuki) is a medical-nin from Konohagakure.

description.text: Furui (フルイ, Furui) was Motoi's father, a Kumogakure shinobi and one of the members of the Eight-Tails Capture Team.
Fusō (扶桑, Fusō) was a nurse and a citizen of Amegakure, where she lived in a small town with her son Nagato and her husband Ise.
description.html: Fusō (扶桑, Fusō) was a nurse and a citizen of Amegakure, where she lived in a small village with her son and husband.

description.text: Futaba (フタバ, Futaba) was Konohamaru's classmate at the Konoha Ninja Academy.
description.html: Futaba (フタバ) is a former academy student of Konohagakure.

description.text: Futami (フタミ, Futami) was a thief and the first follower of Hagoromo Ōtsutsuki.
Futsu (フツ, Futsu) is a shinobi who fights in the coliseum in the service of En Oyashiro.
Fuyō (フヨウ, Fuyō) is a Chūnin from Amegakure who teamed with Ajisai and Suiren.

Fū (フウ, Fū) was a kunoichi from Takigakure and the last jinchūriki of Chōmei. In the anime, she participated in the joint Chūnin Exams between Konoha and Sunagakure. She dies after being captured by Hidan and Kakuzu with the extraction of the Bijū from her. She was later revived by Kabuto Yakushi during the Fourth Shinobi World War and later used as one of Obito Uchiha's Six Paths of Pain.
Fū Yamanaka (山中フー, Yamanaka Fū) was an ANBU of Konoha, a member of the Yamanaka Clan, and apparently a high-ranking member of the Root Association. He was Danzō's bodyguard at the Kage Meeting.
Fujin (風神, Fujin) and his brother Raijin are known as the Legendary Stupid Brothers.
description.html: Fūjin (風神, Fūjin) and his brother Raijin are the Legendary Stupid Brothers.

description.text: Fūka (フウカ, Fūka) was a kunoichi who appears in the first Naruto Shippūden filler saga. She is part of the group of ninjas who steal the bodies of the 12 Ninja Guardians.
Fūta Kagetsu (花月風太, Kagetsu Fūta) is a medicinal herb seller and the eldest son of Tōbei Kagetsu. , who was supposed to inherit his father's money after his apparent death.
description.html: Fūta Kagetsu (花月風太, Kagetsu Fūta) is a medicinal herb salesman and the eldest son of Tōbei Kagetsu who was supposed to inherit his father's money after his apparent death.

description.text: Gaara (我愛羅, Gaara) is a shinobi of Sunagakure and the Fifth Kazekage (五代目風影, Godaime Kazekage ), was the General Commander of the Great Shinobi Alliance army and Commander of the Fourth Division. He was part of the former Baki team. He is the youngest son of the Fourth Kazekage, Rasa and Karura, younger brother of Temari and Kankuro. He was Shukaku's third Jinchūriki. Gaara earned the nickname Sandfall Gaara (砂瀑の我愛羅, Sabaku no Gaara; in the dub as Desert Gaara). He is Shinki's adoptive father.

Gaku Inuzuka (犬塚ガク, Inuzuka Gaku) was a ninja belonging to the Inuzuka Clan of Konoha who was part of Minato's Squad during the Third Shinobi World War. . Like every member of his clan, he is accompanied by a dog.
description.html: Gaku Inuzuka (犬塚ガク, Inuzuka Gaku) is a jōnin from Konohagakure's Inuzuka clan.

description.text: Gama (蝦蟇, Gama) is a toad from Mount Myōboku and summoned by Jiraiya who carries with him the toad summoning contract scroll .
Gamabunta (ガマブン太 Gamabunta) is the leader of all the summoned Toads and is denoted by a great friendship with the Great Wise Toad, the leader of Mount Myōboku, the place from which he comes.
Gamaden (ガマ伝, Gamaden) is one of the many Toads that live on Mount Myōboku.
description.html: Gamaden (ガマ伝, Gamaden) is an elite toad of Mount Myōboku.[1]

description.text: Gamagorō (ガマ五郎, Gamagorō) is a giant toad from Mount Myōboku.
description.html: Gamagorō (ガマ五郎, Gamagorō) is a giant toad that resides on Mount Myōboku.

description.text: Gamahiro (ガマヒロ) is one of the greatest warrior toads on Mount Myōboku.
Gamaken (ガマケン, Gamaken) is one of the three most powerful great warrior toads in the world. Mount Myōboku.
Gamakichi (ガマ吉, Gamakichi) is one of Gamabunta's sons.

Gamamaru (ガマ丸, Gamamaru), commonly known as Great Toad Sage (大ガマ仙人, Ōgama Sennin) is the oldest and most respected of all the toads that inhabit Mount Myōboku. Because of his age, the toads affectionately call him Grand Honored Old Man (大じじ様, Ōjiji-sama). He is famous for his highly accurate prophecies.
Gamariki (ガマ力, Gamariki) is a toad from Mount Myōboku.
Gamatama (ガマたま, Gamatama) is a toad belonging to Mount Myōboku.
description.html: Gamatama (ガマたま, Gamatama) is a tadpole from Mount Myōboku.

description.text: Gamatatsu (ガ立つ, Gamatatsu - literally 'Dragon Toad') is the son of Gamabunta and younger brother of Gamakichi.
Gameru (ガメル, Gameru) was a ninja who possessed one of Iō's ninja weapons, the Dakō spear.
Gandō (ガンドウ, Gandō) was a member of the Shirogane Clan, who appeared in Naruto: Uzumaki Chronicles 2.
Ganryū (巌流, Ganryu) is a jōnin-ranked ninja from Kirigakure who is known as the sole survivor of the Yosuga Pass Tragedy.
Gantetsu (丸鉄, Gantetsu) is a former member of the Shinobazu criminal organization. He dedicated himself to robbing and murdering families in Forest Country with his criminal companions.
description.html: Gantetsu (丸鉄, Gantetsu) is a missing-nin and a former member of Shinobazu.

description.text: Gantetsu (ガンテツ, Gantetsu) is a renegade ninja from Iwagakure who accompanied Chōseki.
Garaga (ガラガ, Garaga) is a snake inhabitant of Ryūchi Cave.
Gari (ガリ, Gari) was a ninja from Iwagakure who was resurrected by Kabuto Yakushi's Edo Tensei to fight in the Fourth Great Ninja War.
Garuda (ガルダ, Garuda) is a falcon and the personal summoning of Sasuke Uchiha.
description.html: Garuda (ガルダ, Garuda) is a hawk and the personal summon of Sasuke Uchiha.

description.text: Garyō (我龍, Garyō) is the leader of the Ryūha Armament Alliance.
description.html: Garyō (我龍) is the leader of the Ryūha Armament Alliance.

description.text: Garō (我婁, Garō) was one of the 'Externals' (外陣アウトー, Autō) of the Kara organization.
description.html: Garō (我婁, ガロウ, Garō) was a man who worked for Kara as an Outer.

description.text: Gataro (ガタロ, Gataro) is a pirate from an island located between the Country of Fire and the Country of Lightning.
The Moon Keeper was a gigantic fiddler crab which served as a guardian from the entrance to the Moon.
description.html: The Gatekeeper was a giant fiddler crab that served as the guardian of the Moon's entrance.

description.text: Gatsu (ガツ, Gatsu) is a bounty hunter, he only appeared in the filler of the anime Naruto.
Gatō (ガトー, Gatō) He was a commercial magnate from the Land of Waves and founder of the Gatō Company. He secretly engaged in drug trafficking and smuggling.
description.html: Gatō (ガトー, Gatō) was a shipping magnate and founder of Gatō Company. He also was secretly a drug dealer as well as the owner of a smuggling business and attempted to take control of the Land of Waves. He was one of the main antagonists of the Land of Waves arc.

description.text: Gazeru (ガゼル, Gazeru) is a member of the Konoha ANBU under the direct command of the Hokage.
Gekkō (ゲッコウ, Gekkō) is a member of the Byakuya Group.

Gekomatsu (ゲコ松, Gekomatsu) is a toad belonging to Mount Myōboku, it is small and green. He turned to Naruto Uzumaki to help him gather chakra fragments to restore the toad statue his grandfather gave him to the glow it once had.
Gen Katsugi (かつぎゲン, Katsugi Gen ) is a resident of Konohagakure.
description.html: Gen Katsugi (かつぎゲン, Katsugi Gen) is a former academy student of Konohagakure.

description.text: Gen'yūmaru (幻幽丸, Gen'yūmaru) was a prisoner of Orochimaru in Otogakure, and his last vessel before Sasuke Uchiha arrived.
description.html: Gen'yūmaru (幻幽丸, Gen'yūmaru) was a prisoner of Orochimaru, and his third host body.

description.text: Genba (ゲンバ, Genba) was a member of a group called 'Soulless' (魂抜き, Tamanuki) and was listed in the Konohagakure Bingo Book. He died half a year before the events that occurred in the Hidden Legend of Sakura.
description.html: Genba (ゲンバ, Genba) was a member of the group called "Tamanuki" (魂抜き) who was listed in Konohagakure's bingo book.

description.text: Genbu (ゲンブ, Genbu), also known as Turtle Island (島亀, Shimagame), is an ancient and gigantic turtle that resides in the Land of Lightning. Large vegetation has grown on its shell that has taken the shape of a large spike-shaped structure. Generally the turtle remains motionless in such a way that everything above it gives the impression of being an island. For a long time, its shell was used as a training ground for the ninjas of the Hidden Village of the Clouds, especially for A and Killer B, where one of them discovered that within the landscape formed within the island there are temples where a Jinchūriki can control his beasts.
Genbu(ゲンブ, Genbu) was a minister of the Country of That.
description.html: Genbu (ゲンブ, Genbu) was a minister in the Land of That.

description.text: Gengetsu Hōzuki (鬼灯幻月, Hōzuki Gengetsu) was the Second Mizukage (二代目水影, Nidaime Mizukage; literally means 'Second Shadow of Water') of Kirigakure. He was revived by Kabuto Yakushi to fight in the Fourth Shinobi World War against the Great Shinobi Alliance, being an ally of Akatsuki.

Gengo (ゲンゴ, Gengo) is a renegade ninja from Kirigakure and was the leader of the Country of Silence, in addition to founder and leader of the Iluminados organization; He is currently imprisoned at the hands of ANBU.
He is a Genie (魔神, Majin) in the bottle that appears in Naruto: Gentle Breeze Chronicles the movie: Naruto, the Genie, and the Three Wishes 'ttebayo!!.
description.html: The Genie (魔神, Majin) appears from a bottle that appears in Naruto, the Genie, and the Three Wishes, Believe It!.

description.text: Genji (元帥, Genji) is a highly respected elder of the village of Kirigakure.
Genma Shiranui (不知火ゲンマ, Shiranui Genma) is a Tokubetsu Jōnin from Konoha. He became the referee in the final rounds of the Chūnin Exams after the death of Hayate Gekkō.
Genmai (玄米, Genmai) is a citizen of Inaho Village who appears in Naruto: Crossed Paths. .
description.html: Genmai (ゲンマイ, Genmai) is a villager from the Inaho Village who appears in Naruto: The Cross Roads.

description.text: Gennai (源内, Gennai) is a Genin from Konohagakure who participated in the Chūnin Exams.
description.html: Gennai (源内, Gennai) is a genin from Konohagakure.

description.text: Gennō (ゲンノウ, Gennō) was a ninja from Kagerō Village , a town that had frequently clashed with Konoha in the past.
He was the son of Gennō, whose name is unknown.
description.html: He was a citizen of Kagerō Village, and the son of Gennō.

description.text: Genshō Ryūdōin (龙堂院幻将, Ryūdōin Genshō) is the brother of Rokkaku and Jako, and son of Agira.
Gensui Amagiri (天霧ゲンスイ, Amagiri Gensui) is a ninja from Yumegakure and the main antagonist of Naruto Shippūden Kizuna Drive.
Genzō (ゲンゾウ, Genzō) is the photographer in charge of taking photos of the newly minted Ninja Academy Students. graduates, for use on your ninja profile.
description.html: Genzō (ゲンゾウ, Genzō) is a photographer that takes pictures of newly graduated Academy students for use in their ninja profile.

description.text: Gerotora (ゲロ寅, Gerotora) or also known as Gamatora (ガマ寅, Gamatora) is a unique species of toad, which guards Mount Myōboku, and secretly carries in the paper scroll in his abdomen the key to the seal that contains the Nine-Tailed Fox inside Naruto. It resides within its contractor and is known for its excellent resistance.
This Giant Anteater was part of Condor's team, the Four Animal Ninja Warriors.
description.html: It was giant anteater that was part of Condor's ninja animal team.

description.text: The Bee Giant (巨大蜂, Kyodaibachi/Kyodaihachi) was a gigantic Ninja Bee and a personal summon of Suzumebachi.
The Giant Centipede was one of the Animal Path summons that was under Pain's control.
description.html: This giant centipede was a summon of Pain.

description.text: The Giant Clam (蜃, Ōhamaguri) was the personal invocation of Gengetsu Hōzuki.
The Giant Crab (躯大蟹, Mukuro Okani) was a giant crustacean that inhabited in the waters somewhere between the Country of Fire and the Country of Lightning.
description.html: The Giant Corpse Crab (躯大蟹, Mukuro Ōkani) was a giant crustacean that inhabited the waters somewhere between the Land of Fire and the Land of Lightning.

description.text: The Giant Crustacean was one of the summons of the Animal Path.
The Giant Bird Piercing Beak was one of the Animal Path Summons under Pain's control.
This Giant Bird is Gennō's personal Summon and comes from the island of mountains.
description.html: The Giant Eagle is the personal summon of Gennō, and hails from the Land of Mountains.

description.text: The Giant Bird is one of the Forgotten Island scientists' experiments to be a Summon.
description.html: The Giant EagleGennō, Isla_Olvidada.

description.text: The Giant Insect is Shino Aburame's personal summon.
description.html: This giant insect is the personal summon of Shino Aburame.

description.text: The Giant Marlin is a fish that was summoned during the Third Shinobi World War. He did not return to his birthplace because he had a shuriken stuck to his head.
description.html: This Giant Marlin was once a summon during the Third Shinobi World War who did not return to its birthplace because it had a shuriken stuck to its head.

description.text: Cancerberus is one of the Animal Path summons that was under Pain's control.
The Giant Ox was one of the Animal Path summons under Pain's control.
description.html: This giant ox was a summon of Pain.

description.text: The Giant Panda is one of the Animal Path summons that was under Pain's control.
description.html: This is a large panda summoned by Pain.

description.text: The Giant Rhinoceros was one of the Animal Path summons under Pain's control.
description.html: This rhinoceros was a summon of Pain.

data.title: Camaleón Gigante de Cola de Serpiente

description.text: The Snake-Tailed Giant Chameleon is one of the Animal Path summons that was under Pain. Pain control.
description.html: This large chimera-like chameleon with a snake for a tail is a summon of Nagato.

description.text: The Giant Squid was a cephalopod of enormous size that lived in the waters around the island where Killer B and Naruto learned to control their Tailed Beast. It seemed to be one of the most hostile animals on the island.
description.html: This giant squid was a large cephalopod that served as the guardian of Genbu where A and Killer B trained.

description.text: Giichi (ギイチ, Giichi) is a bricklayer and an old friend of Tazuna.
description.html: Giichi (ギイチ, Giichi) is a construction worker and an old friend of Tazuna.

description.text: Ginji (ギンジ) was one of Kakuzu's two bankers, the other being Kyōya.
description.html: Ginji (ギンジ, Ginji) is the banker of Kakuzu, a member of the Akatsuki.

description.text: Ginkaku (銀角, Ginkaku) was, along with his brother Kinkaku, part of the two legendary Golden and Silver Brothers of Kumogakure.
Gitai (ギタイ, Gitai) was a shinobi from the Demon Country.
Goji is a Genin from Sunagakure who teams up with Datsuji.
Gonbee (権兵衛, Gonbee) is a Jōnin of Kirigakure.
description.html: Gonbee (権兵衛, Gonbee) is a Kirigakure jōnin.

description.text: Gongorō Kamakura (鎌倉ゴンゴロウ, Kamakura Gongorō) is an actor known for his performance as Kagemasa (カゲマサ, Kagemasa).
Goshiki (ゴシキ, Goshiki). ) is a tour guide at Tanzaku Castle.
description.html: Goshiki (ゴシキ, Goshiki) is a tour guide at Tanzaku Castle.

description.text: Gosunkugi (五寸釘, Gosunkugi) was a thief who operated outside and inside the Stone Country.
Gotta (ゴッタ, Gotta) was a member of the Iburi Clan.

Gozu (牛頭, Gozu) is a shinobi who was in the service of Orochimaru. He was a member of the mission to capture the Sanbi and the physically strongest person of the entire Guren Team. After failing in his mission he abandoned Otogakure, fleeing along with Guren and Yūkimaru.
Gozu (ゴズ, Gozu) He was a member of the Anbu faction and was part of the Konohagakure root led by Danzō Shimura.
description.html: Gozu (ゴズ, Gozu) was a member of Konohagakure's Anbu faction Root led by Danzō Shimura.

description.text: Guren (紅蓮, Guren) is a kunoichi formerly belonging to Otogakure. She was the leader of Orochimaru's subordinates, as well as being the only known user of the Crystal Release.
Guren (グレン, Guren) was a prisoner of Orochimaru who was in the Lair hideout. of the North.
Guruko (グルコ, Guruko) is a ninken, and personal summon of Kakashi Hatake.
Gyokurō Chabashira (茶柱ギョクロウ, Chabashira Gyokurō) is a Genin of Konohagakure.
description.html: Gyokurō Chabashira (茶柱ギョクロウ, Chabashira Gyokurō) is a genin of Konohagakure.

description.text: Gyūki (牛鬼, Gyūki) also known as the Eight-Tails (八尾, Hachibi) is a Tailed Beast with the appearance of a half-octopus ox, which was sealed in the body of a Kumogakure shinobi nicknamed Killer B, however, was captured by Madara Uchiha. It is currently sealed again in B after the defeat and subsequent sealing of Kaguya.
Gōshō (豪焼) was the leader of the pottery village.
description.html: Gōshō (豪焼, Gōshō) was the leader of Ceramic Village.

description.text: Gōza (ゴウザ, Gōza) is a lord of Sunagakure.
description.html: Gōza (ゴウザ, Gōza) is a Senior from Sunagakure.

description.text: Gōzu (业头, Gōzu) and his younger brother Meizu are twin brothers and former Chūnin of Kirigakure, known as the Devil Brothers.
Hachidai (八大, Hachidai) is a miner belonging to the town of Katabami Kinzan located in the Land of Rivers.
description.html: Hachidai (ハチダイ, Hachidai) is a miner from the Land of Rivers.

description.text: Hagiri (ハギリ) was a friend of Tenma Izumo during his stay at Konohagakure Academy. , Rikudō Sennin), was a monk who wanted peace to reign in the world. He was a figure praised as a god who founded the Ninshū and created the shinobi world on earth. He was the son of Kaguya Ōtsutsuki and the first human to be born with chakra. He possessed the Rinnegan, the most powerful Dōjutsu of the three legendary Dōjutsus. He defeated the Ten-Tails with the help of his brother and sealed the beast within himself, thus becoming the first jinchūriki in history.
description.html: Hagiri (ハギリ, Hagiri) was a friend of Tenma Izumo during their time in Konohagakure's Academy.

description.text: Hagoromo Ōtsutsuki (大筒木ハゴロモ, Ōtsutsuki Hagoromo), quien más tarde sería conocido como el Sabio de los Seis Caminos (六道仙人, Rikudō Sennin), fue un monje que deseaba que la paz reinara en el mundo. Fue una figura alabada como un dios que fundó el Ninshū y creó el mundo shinobi en la tierra. Fue hijo de Kaguya Ōtsutsuki y el primer humano en nacer con chakra. Poseía el Rinnegan, el Dōjutsu más poderoso de los tres legendarios Dōjutsus. Derrotó al Diez Colas con la ayuda de su hermano y selló la bestia dentro de sí mismo, convirtiéndose así en el primer jinchūriki en la historia.
Haguruma (ハグルマ, Haguruma) is a former computer programmer. video games.
Haido (ハイド, Haido) is a warlord who sought to obtain the vein of the Gelel Stone and was also the main antagonist in Naruto Movie 2: The Illusionary Ruins in the Deep of the Earth.
Hainosuke is a pet cat of Kumogakure who appears in Naruto Shippūden: Ultimate Ninja Storm 4.
description.html: Hainosuke is a pet cat from Kumogakure that appears in Naruto Shippūden: Ultimate Ninja Storm 4.

description.text: Hakkaku (ハッカク, Hakkaku) is a ninja chef of the Land of Lightning.
description.html: Hakkaku (ハッカク, Hakkaku) is a cooking-nin from the Land of Lightning.

description.text: Hako Kuroi (黒衣ハコ, Kuroi Hako) is a Genin from Konohagakure. She is part of Team 25 alongside Hōki Taketori and Renga Kokubō.

Haku (白, Haku) was a ninja from the Land of Water who was taken in and trained by Zabuza Momochi. He had the ability to combine the Wind and Water Element to form a new Kekkei Genkai called Ice belonging to the Yuki Clan.
He is Haku's father, his name is currently unknown.
description.html: He was a simple farmer and the father of Haku.

description.text: Haku's mother was a member of the Yuki Clan. His name is unknown.
description.html: This woman was a member of the Yuki clan as well as Haku's mother.

description.text: Hakuhyō (薄氷, Hakuhyō) was a former inhabitant of Kirigakure and son of Kahyō. His death instigated the creation of the Ryūha Armament Alliance.
Hakui (白医, Hakui) was a missing ninja of the 'Anbu of the Leaf' who appeared in Naruto Shippūden: Ultimate Ninja Heroes 3 who served under Shinga.
description.html: Hakui (白医, Hakui) was a missing-nin of the "Leaf's Anbu" who appeared in Naruto Shippūden: Ultimate Ninja Heroes 3 that served under Shinga.

description.text: Hakui (ハクイ, Hakui) is a Kumogakure kunoichi who was part of the Medical and Logistics Support Division of the Grand Shinobi Alliance during the Fourth Shinobi World War. .
description.html: Hakui (ハクイ, Hakui) is a medical-nin of Konohagakure.

description.text: Hakuto (ハクト, Hakuto) is a genin from Sunagakure and leader of the Hōki Family. After an elaborate plan came to fruition, he moved to Konohagakure with Shigezane to live with the Nara Clan.
Hamaki Mimura (美村ハマキ, Mimura Hamaki) is a jōnin-level shinobi. from Konohagakure.

Hamura Ōtsutsuki (大筒木ハムラ, Ōtsutsuki Hamura) was one of the children of Princess Kaguya Ōtsutsuki and the brother of Hagoromo Ōtsutsuki, being the first people to be born with chakra. Hamura was the ancestor of the Hyūga Clan and founder of the shinobi of the Moon.
The giant golem was a creature that resided on the moon alongside Toneri Ōtsutsuki. Before being animated, it was a stone monument made in the image of Hamura Ōtsutsuki.
description.html: The giant golem was a creature that resided on the moon alongside Toneri Ōtsutsuki. Prior to being animated, it was a stone monument made in Hamura Ōtsutsuki's image.

description.text: Han (ハン Han) was a shinobi of Iwagakure and the last Jinchūriki of Kokuō. He was later resurrected by Kabuto Yakushi and used in the Fourth Shinobi World War.
Hana is a student at Konohagakure Academy who appears in Naruto Shippūden: Ultimate Ninja Storm 4.
description.html: Hana is an academy student of Konohagakure who appears in Naruto Shippūden: Ultimate Ninja Storm 4.

description.text: Hana Inuzuka (犬塚ハナ, Inuzuka Hana) is a chūnin-ranked kunoichi belonging to the Inuzuka Clan of Konohagakure. She is the daughter of Tsume Inuzuka, older sister of Kiba Inuzuka, and her canine companions are the Three Haimaru Brothers.

Hanabi Hyūga (日向ハナビ, Hyūga Hanabi) is a kunoichi of Konohagakure, member and heir of the clan Hyūga. She is the youngest daughter of the clan leader, Hiashi Hyūga, and younger sister of Hinata Hyūga. In the anime, she is the leader of Team 15, consisting of Wasabi, Tsubaki, and Namida.

Hanare (ハナレ, Hanare) is a kunoichi from the Lock Village. She was an orphan who wanted to see her parents. He searched for them tirelessly and in a certain part of his search he got lost and ran into Kakashi Hatake.
Hanuma is a monkey who made his debut in Naruto Shippūden: Legends: Akatsuki Rising.
Hanzaki (ハンザキ, Hanzaki) is the leader of the members of the Fuma Clan who were not attracted by Orochimaru's power.

Hanzō (半蔵), also known as Hanzō of the Salamander (山椒魚の半蔵, Sanshōuo no Hanzō), was the absolute leader of Amegakure. He was killed along with his entire family and acquaintances by Pain, who would later take control of the village.
Haori (ハオリ, Haori) was an inhabitant of the Land of Ancestors during the reign of Kaguya Ōtsutsuki .
description.html: Haori (ハオリ, Haori) was a resident of the Land of Ancestors during the reign of Kaguya Ōtsutsuki.

description.text: Harine (ハリネ, Harine) was one of the children of the orphanage where Kabuto lived in his childhood.
description.html: Harine (ハリネ, Harine) was one of the orphans at the Konoha Orphanage.

description.text: Haruna (春菜, Haruna) is the Daimyo of the Country of the Vegetables, who replaced his father after he was murdered. She is also known as Shun (旬, Shun) because of her costume.
Harusame (ハルサメ, Harusame) was Utakata's teacher.

Hashirama Senju (千手柱間, Senju Hashirama) was the First Hokage (初代火影, Shodai Hokage) of Konohagakure, a ninja recognized for being a member and leader of the Senju Clan during his time, in addition to the past Reincarnation of Asura Ōtsutsuki. He was known for creating and mastering the Wood Element. He founded Konoha alongside Madara Uchiha.He is considered the greatest and most powerful shinobi of his time, becoming considered the god of shinobi (忍の神, Shinobi no Kami). He was resurrected by Orochimaru in the Fourth Shinobi World War.
Hassaku Onomichi (尾道八朔, Onomichi Hassaku) is a shinobi from Kirigakure and one of the New: Seven Ninja Swordsmen.
Hayama Shirakumo (白雲ハヤマ, Shirakumo Hayama) is a Jōnin of Konoha who protected the borders after the invasion of the Sound and Sand ninjas.
Hayase (ハヤセ, Hayase) is a Chūnin-level ninja from Konoha.
description.html: Hayase (ハヤセ, Hayase) is a chūnin of Konohagakure.

description.text: Hayate Gekkō (月光ハヤテ, Gekkō Hayate) was a Tokubetsu Jōnin who served as an examiner for the preliminary round of the Chūnin Exams. After discovering the invasion plans by the Sand and the Sound, a ninja from Sunagakure confronted Baki, dying in said encounter.
Hazuki Uchiha (うちはハヅキ, Uchiha Hazuki) was an inhabitant of Konohagakure belonging to the Uchiha clan and the mother of Izumi Uchiha.
description.html: Hazuki Uchiha (うちはハヅキ, Uchiha Hazuki) was a member of Konohagakure's Uchiha clan.

description.text: This Chief Ninja (忍頭, Shinobigashira) of Kumogakure went to Konoha to sign a peace treaty between the two nations nine years before the beginning of the series.
description.html: He was the Head ninja (忍頭, shinobigashira) of Kumogakure nine years before the start of the series.

description.text: She is a girl who is the granddaughter of the leader of an unknown village.
description.html: She is the granddaughter of the Village Headman.

description.text: Hebihime is a shinobi from Otogakure and one of the recruitable characters in Naruto: Ultimate Ninja Online.
Hebiichigo (蛇苺, Hebiichigo) was a kunoichi of Kirigakure and one of the New: Seven Ninja Swordsmen.
Heiji (平次, Heiji ) was a ninja from Amegakure who was resurrected by Kabuto Yakushi for the Fourth Shinobi World War.
Heki (碧, Heki) is a Jōnin from Kirigakure.
description.html: Heki (碧, Heki) is a jōnin of Kirigakure.

description.text: Hiashi Hyūga (日向ヒアシ, Hyūga Hiashi) is a jōnin-ranked ninja from Konohagakure and the current leader of the Hyūga Clan. He is the older twin brother of Hizashi Hyūga, father of Hinata, who is the oldest, and Hanabi, who is the youngest, in addition to taking care of Neji Hyūga.
Hibachi (ヒバチ, Hibachi) is a student at the Ninja Academy, assigned to Iruka Umino's class.
description.html: Hibachi (ヒバチ, Hibachi) is a former academy student of Konohagakure, assigned to Iruka Umino's class.

description.text: Hibari (ひばり, Hibari) was in Konohamaru Sarutobi's class at the Konohagakure Ninja Academy. She is an aspiring kunoichi.
description.html: Hibari (ひばり, Hibari) is a former academy student of Konohagakure.

description.text: Hidan (飛段, Hidan) was a member of the Akatsuki Organization. His partner was Kakuzu, despite having a mutual dislike for each other. He wore the ring 'Three' (三, San) on his left index finger. He was the newest member of Akatsuki, Kisame refers to Hidan and Kakuzu as the 'Zombie Combo' (ゾンビコンビ, Zonbi Konbi) due to the fact that in a sense, they could not die.
Hidari (ヒダリ, Hidari) is a former shinobi from Blue Valley who assisted in the kidnapping of Kiri to obtain title to the Green Rice Bridge.
Hidero (日出郎, Hidero) appears in the film Naruto the Movie: Snow Princess Rescue!. He is a popular actor in the film 'Princess Gale', where he plays the character Shishimaru.
description.html: Hidero (日出郎, Hidero) appears in Naruto the Movie: Ninja Clash in the Land of Snow.

description.text: Hikaku Uchiha (うちはヒカク, Uchiha Hikaku) was a member of the Uchiha Clan in the past, before Konoha was founded.
description.html: Hikaku Uchiha (うちはヒカク, Uchiha Hikaku) was a member of the Uchiha clan before the founding of Konohagakure.

description.text: Hikaru (ヒカル, Hikaru) is the captain of the Kumogakure ship that transported Naruto Uzumaki and the ninjas of Konohagakure towards the island where the jinchūriki would be confined.
description.html: Hikaru (ヒカル, Hikaru) is a shinobi from Kumogakure and captain of the ship which escorted the Konohagakure delegation to the island.

description.text: Hikaru Tsuki (ツキヒカル, Tsuki Hikaru) is the only son of the prince of the Country of the Moon, and therefore grandson of the King, Kakeru Tsuki.
Himatsu (ヒマツ) is a citizen of Takigakure.
description.html: Himatsu (ヒマツ, Himatsu) is a citizen from Takigakure.

description.text: Himawari Uzumaki (うずまきヒマワリ, Uzumaki Himawari) is a member of the Konohagakure clan. Uzumaki and direct descendant of the Hyūga Clan on her mother's side, daughter of the Seventh Hokage, Naruto Uzumaki and Hinata Hyūga, as well as the younger sister of Boruto Uzumaki.
Princess Himeno is an exclusive character from the video game Naruto Shippūden Kizuna Drive, and only appears in free missions.
description.html: Himeno is a princess of a sick-bedded father that needed to be protected from shinobi bandits during the Swelling Mushroom Mission.

description.text: Himuka Suzukaze (鈴風ひむか) was a Konohagakure genin who was part of Team 2 as a substitute.
description.html: Himuka Suzukaze (涼風ヒムカ, Suzukaze Himuka) was a genin of Konohagakure.

description.text: Himushi (ヒムシ, Himushi) is a ninja mercenary and the leader of the Nokizaru Group.
Hina (ヒナ, Hina) is a cat ninja who lives with Nekobaa at an Uchiha supply base. Suigetsu mistakes him for a Tanuki (raccoon in Japanese).
description.html: Hina (ヒナ, Hina) is a ninneko that lives with Nekobaa at an Uchiha supply base.

description.text: She is the mother of Hinata and Hanabi and wife of Hiashi Hyūga.
description.html: She is the wife of Hiashi Hyūga, the head of Konohagakure's Hyūga clan.

description.text: Hinata Hyūga (日向ヒナタ, Hyūga Hinata) whose current name is Hinata Uzumaki (うずまきヒナタ, Uzumaki Hinata) is a Chūnin-ranked kunoichi from Konohagakure and former heir to the main branch of the Hyūga Clan, as well as being the daughter of Hiashi Hyūga, Neji Hyūga's cousin and older sister. by Hanabi Hyūga. She was part of Team Kurenai, partnering with Kiba Inuzuka and Shino Aburame. Later, she became Naruto's wife, with whom she had two children, Boruto Uzumaki and Himawari Uzumaki.
Hinoe (丙, Hinoe) is an ANBU from Konohagakure who was under the orders of Danzō Shimura in the secret organization Root.
Hinoki (ヒノキ, Hinoki) is the chief of the Great Evil Valley village and Nazuna's grandfather in Naruto: Path of the Ninja 2.
description.html: Hinoki (ヒノキ, Hinoki) is the village head of the valley of Great Evil and the grandfather of Nazuna in Naruto: Path of the Ninja 2.

description.text: Hinoko (ヒノコ, Hinoko) is a young ANBU from Konoha where she is known by the code name Soku (鏃, Soku).
Hinoto (丁) is a former member of the Anbu Root faction of Konohagakure.
Chief Hiccup (河馬組長, Kaba Kumichō) is a giant hippopotamus who lives on Turtle Island. He is considered to be is one of the four fiercest animals that reside there.
description.html: Hippo Boss (カバ組長, Kaba Kumichō) is a giant hippopotamus that resides on the Island Turtle. He is noted to be one of the four fiercest animals to reside there.

description.text: Hiruko (ヒルコ, Hiruko) was the main antagonist of Naruto Shippūden the Movie: Inheritors of the Will of Fire. He was a renegade ninja. of Konohagakure who wished to plunge the world into a Fourth Great Shinobi War and then conquer it.

Hiruko (ヒルコ, Hiruko) was a hollow Human Puppet used by Akatsuki member Sasori, who generally He lived inside this puppet, wearing it as a kind of metal armor. This puppet walks hunched over, very close to the ground, which makes Sasori look, under the black clothes of the Akatsuki Organization, like some kind of short monster. This puppet created by Sasori is one of his favorites. It allows him to hide inside it due to its large size. It has the appearance of a scorpion, although when viewed from above, it looks like a face with a long tongue. In the anime, it was said that Hiruko was once a ninja from Sunagakure, but after his death, she became one of the first human puppets. by Sasori. This puppet was destroyed by Sakura Haruno with a single blow, turning it into pieces.
description.html: Hiruko (ヒルコ, Hiruko) was once a great shinobi, but upon his death, he became Sasori's favourite human puppet.[1]

description.text: Hiruzen Sarutobi (猿飛ヒルゼン, Sarutobi Hiruzen) was the Third Hokage (三代目火影, Sandaime Hokage) of Konohagakure, in His youth was the student of the first two Hokages, Hashirama and Tobirama Senju along with his companions, Homura Mitokado and Koharu Utatane, and he was the teacher of Jiraiya, Tsunade and Orochimaru, the legendary Sannin. He was resurrected by Orochimaru in the Fourth Shinobi World War.
Hisame is a renegade ninja from Amegakure who appeared in the second Naruto OVA.
Hisen (ヒゼン) was the former leader of Takigakure, who sacrificed his life protecting the village.
Hishaku (ヒシャク, Hishaku) was a young sailor who dreamed that one day he would be captain of his own ship.
description.html: Hishaku (ヒシャク, Hishaku) was a young sailor who dreamed of becoming a captain of his own ship one day.

description.text: Hitode (ヒトデ, Hitode) is the guardian of a ship from the Country of the Sea.

Hizashi Hyūga (日向ヒザシ, Hyūga Hizashi) was Neji Hyūga's father and twin brother Hiashi Hyūga's youngest, although born second, was placed in the secondary branch. The name Hizashi means 'sunlight' or 'sunrays', and refers to sunlight strong enough to cause burns.
Hoheto Hyūga (日向ホヘト, Hyūga Hoheto) is a ninja from Konohagakure and a member of the Hyūga clan.
description.html: Hoheto Hyūga (日向ホヘト, Hyūga Hoheto) is a shinobi from Konohagakure's Hyūga clan.

description.text: Hohozuki (歩々月, Hohozuki) is a young ninja who appears in the Hidden Legend of Akatsuki: Evil Flowers in Full Bloom. He was Ameyuki's Friend
description.html: Hohozuki (歩々月, Hohozuki) was a friend of Ameyuki.

description.text: Hokushin (ホクシン) is a member of the Watari ninjas alongside Nagare.
Hokuto (ホクト, Hokuto) is a young kunoichi from Hoshigakure.

Homura Mitokado (水戸門ホムラ - Mitokado Homura) is a former jōnin who belonged to the former Team Tobirama and was also a companion of the Third Hokage, Hiruzen Sarutobi and Koharu Utatane. He is currently part of the Konoha Council.
Honoka (ホノカ) was a kunoichi who worked with some researchers on a remote island.

data.title: Daimyō del País de las Aguas Termales

description.text: He is the Feudal Lord of the Country of Hot Springs, he appears next to Raidō, who informs him that they must evacuate the village since it will be part of the battlefield.
description.html: He is the daimyō of the Land of Hot Water.

description.text: Hotaru (ホタル) is the granddaughter of the former leader of the Tsuchigumo Clan, En no Gyōja Tsuchigumo.
Hotarubi (ホタルビ, Hotarubi) was Natsuhi's husband and Sumaru's father. He and his wife had completed star training.
This man was a shinobi of Takigakure. After his death, he became in the Human Path of the Six Paths of Pain.
Hyō (ヒョウ, Hyō) is an ANBU member of Konoha and a former member of the now-disbanded organization, Root.
Old Hyūga is the former leader of the Hyūga clan of Konoha and father of Hiashi and Hizashi Hyūga.
description.html: This unnamed elder was once the head of Konohagakure's Hyūga clan and the father of Hiashi and Hizashi Hyūga.[1]

description.text: Hāto (ハート, Hāto) was En no Gyōja's best apprentice and the Shiranami's father.
Hōichi (ホウイチ, Hōichi) is a shinobi from Sunagakure.
Hōki (ホウキ, Hōki) is a genin from Takigakure who participated in the exam chūnin.
description.html: Hōki (ホウキ, Hōki) is a genin from Takigakure.

description.text: Hōki (宝亀, Hōki) was a ninja from Takumi Village, a member of the Four Men of Heavenly Symbols.

Hōki (ホウキ, Hōki) The migration ninja was a ninja who posed as Mōsō (孟宗) in the Land of Birds. Disguised, he served as Chief Advisor to the Feudal Lord, Ōwashi. He leads the group of Wandering Ninjas. Despite being his leader, Hōki's abilities do not seem on par with those of his group.
Hōki Taketori (竹取ホウキ, Taketori Hōki) is a chūnin Konohagakure. He is part of Team 25 along with Hako Kuroi and Renga Kokubō.
Hōsei (ホウセイ, Hōsei) is a Genin from Konoha who participated in the Chūnin Exams.
description.html: Hōsei (ホウセイ, Hōsei) is a genin of Konohagakure.

description.text: Hōshō (ホウショウ, Hōshō) is a medical ninja from Konohagakure.
description.html: Hōshō (ホウショウ, Hōshō) is a medical-nin from Konohagakure.

description.text: Ibara (イバラ, Ibara) was the mother of one of the students in Naruto's class at the Ninja Academy.
description.html: Ibara (イバラ, Ibara) is a citizen of Konohagakure and the mother of one of the students in Naruto Uzumaki's class at the Academy.

description.text: Ibiki Morino (森乃イビキ, Morino Ibiki) is one of the characters in the manga and anime series Naruto. He is one of Konoha's few Tokubetsu Jōnin. He is head of Konoha's torture and research department. He is the leader of Team 40 consisting of Enko Onikuma, Tsuru Itoi and Dōshu Goetsu.

Ibuse (イブセ, Ibuse) is the salamander summoned by Hanzō, former leader of Amegakure. When fighting atop his salamander, Hanzō was powerful enough to combat and eventually overpower the three Konoha ninjas, those they would later name as Sannin.
Ibushi (イブシ, Ibushi) was the main antagonist who appeared in Naruto: Uzumaki Chronicles 2. He was part of the Shirogane Clan, a clan that used puppets called the 'Puppet Walkers'.
Ichi (壱, Ichi) was one of the antagonists of Naruto Shippūden the Movie: Inheritors of the Will of Fire. He was a ninja and one of the three followers of Hiruko (Ninja), along with Ni and San.
Ichigen (一見, Ichigen) was a young monk who was in training at the Fire Temple.
description.html: Ichigen (一見, Ichigen) was a young monk-in-training at the Fire Temple.

description.text: Ichikishimahime (イチキシマヒメ, Ichikishimahime) is a resident of Ryūchi Cave.
description.html: Ichikishimahime (イチキシマヒメ, Ichikishimahime) is an inhabitant of the Ryūchi Cave.

description.text: Ichirōta Oniyuzu (鬼柚子一朗太, Oniyuzu Ichirōta) is a shinobi from Kirigakure and one of the New: Seven Ninja Swordsmen .
Idate Morino (森乃イダテ, Morino Idate) is the younger brother of Ibiki Morino.
Iggy (イギー, Igī) is a citizen of the Country of Water.
Ikanago (, Ikanago) is a Sunagakure senior who serves on the Suna Council.
description.html: Ikanago (イカナゴ, Ikanago) is a senior of Sunagakure.

description.text: Ikkaku Umino (うみのイッカク, Umino Ikkaku) was the father of Iruka Umino, was a shinobi of Konohagakure who died during the Nine-Tails' Attack on Konoha.
description.html: Ikkaku Umino (うみのイッカク, Umino Ikkaku) was a shinobi from Konohagakure.

description.text: Ikkyū Madoka (まどかイッキュウ, Madoka Ikkyū) is the Daimyō of the Fire Country.
description.html: Ikkyū Madoka (まどかイッキュウ, Madoka Ikkyū) is the current daimyō of the Land of Fire.

description.text: Inabi Uchiha (うちはイナビ, Uchiha Inabi) was a member of the Konoha Military Police and a member of the Uchiha Clan.
Inaho (イナホ, Inaho) is a genin from Konohagakure who participated in the chūnin exams.
Inari (イナリ, Inari) is the son of Tsunami, the grandson of Tazuna, and was Kaiza's adopted son before his death.

Indra Ōtsutsuki (大筒木インドラ, Ōtsutsuki Indora) was the eldest son of the Sage of the Six Paths, in addition to being the first person to suffer the Curse of Hatred, as well as the first user of the Sharingan. She is the ancestor of the Uchiha Clan and creator of Ninjutsu.[1] She is a skilled Sensor Type ninja who is also a member of the Konoha Barrier Team with knowledge of Medical Ninjutsu. She belongs to the Yamanaka Clan and is a member of Team Asuma, along with her teammates Chōji Akimichi and Shikamaru Nara. She is a childhood friend of Sakura Haruno. Later, she became Sai's wife and Inojin Yamanaka's mother.

Ino Yamanaka (山中いの, Yamanaka Ino) es una kunoichi de rango Jōnin de Konohagakure, hija de Inoichi Yamanaka. Es una habilidosa ninja Tipo Sensor que es a su vez miembro del Equipo de Barrera de Konoha con conocimientos de Ninjutsu Médico. Pertenece al Clan Yamanaka y es miembro del Equipo Asuma, junto con sus compañeros Chōji Akimichi y Shikamaru Nara. Es amiga de la infancia de Sakura Haruno. Posteriormente, se convirtió en esposa de Sai y madre de Inojin Yamanaka.
She is the widow of Inoichi Yamanaka and also the mother of Ino Yamanaka.
description.html: She is a citizen of Konohagakure's Yamanaka clan and a member of the Allied Mothers Force.

description.text: Inoichi Yamanaka (山中いのいち, Yamanaka Inoichi) was a Jōnin of Konoha, and along with Shikaku Nara and Chōza Akimichi , was a part of the first Ino-Shika-Cho trio, as well as the father of Ino Yamanaka. He ran the Konoha flower shop. He was the leader of the Intelligence Division of the Great Shinobi Alliance.

Inojin Yamanaka (山中いのじん, Yamanaka Inojin) is a Genin from Konohagakure, a member of the Yamanaka Clan, and the son of Sai and Ino Yamanaka. He is part of Team 10 along with Shikadai Nara and Chōchō Akimichi.
Inomatsu (イノマツ, Inomatsu) is a genin-level ninja from the Konoha village who only appeared in the manga.
description.html: Inomatsu (イノマツ, Inomatsu) is a genin from Konohagakure.

description.text: Iori (衣織, Iori) was a shinobi who served the village of Arrozal Verde until Valle Azul bought him to assassinate his village chief and would later help kidnap Kiri to obtain title to the Arrozal Verde bridge.
description.html: Iori (衣織, Iori) was a villager of Green Banks.

description.text: Iroha (イロハ, Iroha) is a genin from Konohagakure who appeared in Tsunade's Infinite Tsukuyomi dream.
description.html: Iroha (イロハ, Iroha) is a genin from Konohagakure that appeared in Tsunade's Infinite Tsukuyomi dream.

description.text: Iroha Hyūga (日向イロハ, Hyūga Iroha) es un jōnin de Konohagakure perteneciente al clan Hyūga.
description.html: Iroha Hyūga (日向イロハ, Hyūga Iroha) is a jōnin of Konohagakure's Hyūga clan. During the Fourth Shinobi World War, he was assigned to the Kumo Barrier Team.

description.text: Iruka Umino (うみのイルカ, Umino Iruka) is a Chūnin of Konohagakure. He was an instructor and is currently the director of the Ninja Academy.
Isago (イサゴ, Isago) is a jōnin of Sunagakure.
description.html: Isago (イサゴ, Isago) is a jōnin of Sunagakure.

description.text: Isaribi (漁り火, Isaribi) was a human test subject under the control of Amachi, who in turn worked for the legendary sannin Orochimaru.
Ise (伊勢, Ise) was a doctor and a citizen of Amegakure, where he lived in a small village with his wife Fusō and son Nagato.
description.html: Ise (伊勢, Ise) was a doctor and a citizen of Amegakure, where he lived in a small village with his son and wife.

description.text: Ishidate (イシダテ, Ishidate) was a member and leader of the Three Wandering Ninjas along with Karenbana and Kongō. They were hired by Minister Shabadaba to assassinate the king of the Country of the Moon.

Ishikawa (イシカワ, Ishikawa) was the First Tsuchikage (初代土影, Shodai Tsuchikage; literally 'First Shadow of Earth' ) and the founder of Iwagakure in the Land of Earth. In the anime, he was a member of the Kamizuru Clan.

Isobu (磯撫 Isobu) also known as the Three-Tails (三尾, Sanbi) is a Tailed Beast that was sealed in Rin Nohara and later of her death, within a jinchūriki called Yagura Karatachi, better known as the Fourth Mizukage. After the latter's death and subsequent resurrection he was released until he was captured by Deidara and Tobi and sealed by Akatsuki. He was then freed by the Great Shinobi Alliance, however, he was re-captured by Madara Uchiha. He is currently at large following the defeat and subsequent sealing of Kaguya.
Isono (イソノ, Isono) was the winner of the sixty-third Ko Country Culinary Competition.
description.html: Isono (イソノ, Isono) is a man who took part in the eating contest organised in the Land of This.

description.text: Itachi Uchiha (うちはイタチ, Uchiha Itachi) was the older brother of Sasuke Uchiha. He was a prodigious shinobi ofKonohagakure infiltrated the ANBU organization as a double spy alongside his best friend Shisui Uchiha in order to prevent a coup d'état. However, after Shisui's suicide, Itachi accepted the mission to massacre the Uchiha Clan, becoming a deserter and a criminal, and after this he joined Akatsuki where his assigned partner was Kisame Hoshigaki, in the anime his first partner was Jūzō Biwa. . He wore the 'Scarlet' ring (朱, Shu) on his right ring finger.
It was Itachi's crow who had Shisui Uchiha's left Mangekyō Sharingan implanted.n
description.html: This crow had Shisui Uchiha's left eye implanted into it.

description.text: Itama Senju (千手板間, Senju Itama) was one of the brothers of Hashirama and Tobirama Senju. He died at a young age, at the hands of the Uchiha Clan.
description.html: Itama Senju (千手板間, Senju Itama) was a young shinobi from the Senju clan.

description.text: Ittan (イッタン Ittan) is a shinobi from Iwagakure who is part of the Surprise Attack Division.
