Rinji (麟児, Rinji) was a prisoner of Orochimaru and Kabuto's spy who was a member of the Guren Team in charge of the capture of the Sanbi.

Rock Lee (ロック・リー, Rokku Rī) is a Jōnin-ranked ninja from Konohagakure. He is part of Team Guy, along with his teammates Neji Hyūga and Tenten, and was one of the members who were part of the Third Division during the Fourth Shinobi World War.
Rokkaku Ryūdōin (龙堂院六角, Ryūdōin Rokkaku) and his brothers, Genshō and Jako, are introduced in the anime saga The Third Green Beast. .
Rokusuke (ロクスケ, Rokusuke) is a civilian from Katabami Kinzan.
description.html: Rokusuke (ロクスケ, Rokusuke) is a miner from the Land of Rivers.

description.text: Ruiga (ルイガ, Ruiga) was one of the Criminal Brothers who attack the Country of the Vegetables.
Ruka (ルカ, Ruka) is a kunoichi from Kirigakure who is part of a squad led by Monga in the Third Division of the Shinobi Alliance.
Ryuka Tenro is a kunoichi from Yumegakure, as well as an exclusive character in the video game Naruto Shippūden Kizuna Drive for the Play Station Portable (PSP).
Ryōgi (リョウギ, Ryōgi) is a member of the Byakuya Group and a companion Shikadai Nara's game in the Shōgi.
Ryōkan (リョウカン, Ryōkan) is a medical ninja from Sunagakure, Sekka's apprentice.
description.html: Ryōkan (リョウカン, Ryōkan) is a medical-nin of Sunagakure.

description.text: Ryūgan (竜眼, Ryūgan) was a ninja from the Takumi Village and a member of the Four Men of the Celestial Symbols.
Ryūki (龍奇, Ryūki) is a follower of Jashin.
Ryūrimaru (龍鯉丸) was Hisen's summoning creature.
description.html: Ryūrimaru (龍鯉丸, Ryūrimaru) was Hisen's summoning creature that appeared in the light novel adaptation of Mission: Protect the Waterfall Village!.

description.text: Ryūsa (リュウサ, Ryūsa) is a member of the Sunagakure Council. He has served his people for many years and is very loyal to them.
description.html: Ryūsa (リュウサ, Ryūsa) is a senior from Sunagakure. He has served his village for many years.

description.text: Ryūsui (リュウスイ, Ryūsui) is a Genin of the Village Hidden in the Rain, and is also a servant of Pain, making him His ninja band has it torn, demonstrating his loyalty to him.
description.html: Ryūsui (リュウスイ, Ryūsui) is a genin from Amegakure.

description.text: Ryūzetsu (竜舌, Ryūzetsu) was an ANBU-level Kunoichi from Naruto the Movie: Blood Prison. He infiltrated Hōzukijō Castle to prevent Mui from opening the Box of Total Bliss.
Rō (朧, Rō) is an ANBU from Konohagakure.
Rōen (狼嚥, Rōen) is a legendary monster that looks like a mix between a tiger and a wolf.
description.html: Rōen (狼嚥, Rōen) is a legendary monster resembling a cross between a tiger and a wolf.

description.text: Rōshi (老紫, Rōshi) was the last Jinchūriki of Son Gokū. He came from Iwagakure and was defeated by Kisame. He was later resurrected by Kabuto and used in the Fourth Shinobi World War.
Sabiru (サビル, Sabiru) was a young high-level ninja in the Konohagakure Tactical Division. He later discovers that he was a traitor and a spy.
Sabu (サブ, Sabu) is an enka music teacher. He has a large raccoon named Ponta as a pet. Killer B calls him Sabu-chan (サブ ちゃん).
Sada (サダ, Sada) is a genin-level ninja from Benisu Island.
description.html: Sada (サダ, Sada) is a genin from the Benisu Island.

description.text: Sadai (サダイ, Sadai) is a raider who entered the Fire Country to capture Naho. He was on the list of most wanted criminals in the entire nation.
Sadoru (サドル, Sadoru) is a kunoichi from Konohagakure who serves as a teacher at the Ninja Academy.
description.html: Sadoru (サドル, Sadoru) is a kunoichi of Konohagakure who serves as an instructor at the Academy.

description.text: Sagan (サガン, Sagan) is one of the survivors of Madara's Tengai Shinsei, he stayed to help Ōnoki when he was injured in the impact.
Sagi (サギ, Sagi) was the son of Ōwashi and Toki's older twin brother, and the royal heir of the Land of Birds.
description.html: Sagi (サギ, Sagi) was the son of Ōwashi, the older twin brother of Toki, and the real heir of the Land of Birds.

description.text: Sagiri (サギリ, Sagiri) was a merchant who was allowed entry into Nadeshiko Village .
description.html: Sagiri (サギリ, Sagiri) was a tradesman who was granted entry into the Nadeshiko Village.

description.text: Sai (サイ, Sai) whose current name is Sai Yamanaka (山中サイ, Yamanaka Sai), is a young ninja who belonged to the Root and specializes in techniques that use ink. He was a temporary member of Team Kakashi during Sasuke Uchiha's absence. After the Fourth World War Shinobi married Ino Yamanaka and they had a son named Inojin Yamanaka.

Saiken (犀犬, Saiken) also known as the Six-Tails (六尾, Rokubi) is a Tailed Beast, sealed in Utakata of Kirigakure. Saiken was captured by Nagato and sealed by Akatsuki, then released by the Great Shinobi Alliance, however he was recaptured by Madara Uchiha. He is currently free after the defeat and subsequent sealing of Kaguya.
Saisu Kamano (鎌野サイス, Kamano Saisu) is a Chūnin of Konohagakure.
Sajin (砂仁, Sajin) was a chūnin-level ninja from Sunagakure.
description.html: Sajin (砂仁, Sajin) was a chūnin from Sunagakure.

description.text: Sajin (サジン, Sajin) is a Genin from Sunagakure who teams with Mijin and Mujin.
Sajō (サジョウ, Sajō) is a member of the Sunagakure Council.
description.html: Sajō (サジョウ, Sajō) is a Senior from Sunagakure.

description.text: Sakon (左近, Sakon) and his older brother Ukon (右近, Ukon) at first glance looked like conjoined brothers but in reality This was their Kekkei Genkai called Attack of the Twin Demons, and they were the leaders of the group the Sound Four.
Sakumo Hatake (はたけサクモ, Hatake Sakumo), also known as the White Fang of Konoha (木ノ葉の白い牙, Konoha no Shiroi Kiba), was a famous Shinobi of Konohagakure and the father of Kakashi Hatake.

Sakura Haruno (春野サクラ, Haruno Sakura) whose current name is Sakura Uchiha (うちはサクラ, Uchiha Sakura) is the tritagonist of the series. She is a Jōnin-level kunoichi, a member of Team Kakashi, and a great friend of Naruto Uzumaki. After her training with Tsunade, she became one of the best Medical Ninja in the village and is currently the Head of the Medical Department. She eventually became the wife of Sasuke Uchiha and the mother of Sarada Uchiha.
Samidare (五月雨, Samidare) is a Genin of Amegakure.
Samui (サムイ, Samui) is a kunoichi of Kumogakure, and the leader of Team Samui.
San (参, San ) was one of the antagonists of the film Naruto Shippūden the Movie: The Heirs of the Will of Fire. He was a ninja and one of Hiruko's three followers, along with Ichi and Ni.
The Chimera Falcon is a bird creature that was summoned by San in the film Naruto Shippūden 3: The Heirs of the Will of Fire to help him in his fight against the Konoha 11.
description.html: A personal summon of San that appears in Naruto Shippūden the Movie: The Will of Fire.

description.text: Sana (サナ, Sana) is a kunoichi from Sunagakure who is part of a team with Saya and Mamushi.

Sandayū Asama (浅間三太夫, Asama Sandayū) was Yukie Fujikaze's personal assistant, he appeared in Naruto the Movie: The Rescue of the Snow Princess!. It is later revealed that he was once part of the 50th Brigade.
description.html: Sandayū Asama (浅間三太夫, Asama Sandayū) was a personal assistant for Yukie Fujikaze, who appeared in Naruto the Movie: Ninja Clash in the Land of Snow.

description.text: Sangorō (さんごろう, Sangorō) is a miner belonging to the town of Katabami Kinzan located in the Land of Rivers.
description.html: Sangorō (サンゴロウ, Sangorō) is a miner from the Land of Rivers.

description.text: Sansho (サンショ, Sansho) is a student at Konohagakure Academy.
description.html: Sansho (サンショ, Sansho) is an academy student from Konohagakure.

description.text: Sanshō (山椒, Sanshō) is Karashi's mother, and the owner of the curry shop.
description.html: Sanshō (山椒, Sanshō) is the owner of the Curry of Life Shop.

description.text: Santa Yamanaka (山中サンタ, Yamanaka Santa) is a shinobi from Konohagakure. She is a member of the Yamanaka Clan and the Third Division of the Grand Shinobi Alliance during the Fourth Shinobi World War.

Sarada Uchiha (うちはサラダ, Uchiha Sarada) is a Chūnin of Konohagakure, a member of the Uchiha Clan, she is the daughter of Sasuke Uchiha and Sakura Haruno. Additionally, she is a member of Team Konohamaru along with Boruto Uzumaki and Mitsuki.
Sarai (サライ, Sarai) is a citizen of Rōran.
description.html: Sarai (サライ, Sarai) is a citizen of Rōran.

description.text: Sari (サリ, Sari) is a kunoichi from Sunagakure.
description.html: Sari (サリ, Sari) is a genin from Sunagakure.

description.text: Sasame Fūma (ふうまササメ, Fūma Sasame) is a young member of the Fūma Clan.
Sasami (ササミ, Sasami) is a young aggressor affiliated with the Land of Rivers and Momo's younger twin sister.
description.html: Sasami (ササミ, Sasami) is an unknown assailant, who is affiliated to the Land of Rivers.

description.text: Sasori (サソリ, Sasori), also known as Sasori of the Red Sand (赤砂のサソリ, Akasuna no Sasori) , was Chiyo's grandson and a member of Akatsuki. He wore the 'Jewel' ring (玉, Gyoku) on his left thumb. He had Deidara as a companion and before that Orochimaru (until he defected).
He was a shinobi from Sunagakure, son of Chiyo and father of Sasori.
description.html: He was a shinobi from Sunagakure. He was also the son of Chiyo and the father of Sasori.

description.text: Here is one Sunagakure kunoichi. Mother of Akatsuki Sasori, wife of Chiyo's son and daughter-in-law of her.
description.html: She was a kunoichi of Sunagakure. She was also the mother of Sasori and the daughter-in-law of Chiyo.

description.text: Sasuke Sarutobi (猿飛サスケ, Sarutobi Sasuke) was a renowned Shinobi of Konohagakure belonging to the Sarutobi Clan. He was also the father of Hiruzen Sarutobi.
description.html: Sasuke Sarutobi (猿飛サスケ, Sarutobi Sasuke) was a renowned shinobi from Konohagakure's Sarutobi clan.

description.text: Sasuke Uchiha (うちはサスケ, Uchiha Sasuke) is the deuteragonist of the series and one of the survivors of the Uchiha Clan. He is the son of Fugaku Uchiha and Mikoto Uchiha, brother of Itachi Uchiha, as well as the current Reincarnation of Indra Ōtsutsuki. Despite creating relationships with the members of Team Kakashi, Sasuke decided to defect from Konohagakure in search of the power necessary to avenge his clan and kill Itachi.
Satetsu (サテツ, Satetsu) is a jōnin-ranked ninja from Sunagakure.
description.html: Satetsu (サテツ, Satetsu) is a jōnin of Sunagakure.

description.text: Satori (サトリ, Satori) is a demon created by the power of the Box of the Total Bliss that appears in Naruto the Movie: Blood Prison.
Satō (砂糖, Satō) is a Genin from Konohagakure. She teamed up with Shio and Koshō.
description.html: Satō (砂糖, Satō) is a genin of Konohagakure, forming a team with Shio and Koshō.

description.text: Saya (サヤ, Saya) is a kunoichi from Sunagakure who teams up with Sana and Mamushi.
Sayū Jōge (上下サユウ, Jōge Sayū) is a resident of Konohagakure.
description.html: Sayū Jōge (上下サユウ, Jōge Sayū) is a citizen of Konohagakure.

description.text: Sazanami (サザナミ, Sazanami) (also known as Tokichi) was a swordsmith, but became a bounty hunter after being accused of a crime he did not committed.
Sazanami Senka (撰歌細波, Senka Sazanami) is a Genin of Kirigakure and the middle brother of triplets.
Saō (サオウ, Saō) is a Chūnin inhabitant of Konohagakure.
Scarlet Blaze (红莲之瞳) is a ninja from Konohagakure and one of the playable characters in Naruto: Ultimate Ninja Online.
Seimei (セイメイ, Seimei) was the founder of Takumi Village, in which he was considered the strongest Shinobi in his village to the point of being known as the Ultimate Weapon.
Seito (セイト, Seito) was a member of the 12 Ninja Guardians.
Sekiei (セキエイ, Sekiei) was one of the Fabricated who was under the command of Kū.
Sekiei (セキエイ, Sekiei) was one of the Kumogakure spectators who attended the Chūnin Exams in the final round.
Sekiei's Partner was one of the spectators who attended the final round of the Chūnin Exams .
description.html: He was one of the Kumo spectators who attended the Chūnin Exams' final round.

description.text: Sekka (セッカ, Sekka) is a talented medical ninja from Sunagakure, and Ryōkan's mentor.
description.html: Sekka (セッカ, Sekka) is a talented medical-nin of Sunagakure.

description.text: Sekki (セッキ, Sekki) is a Genin from Iwagakure. , who participated with his team in the Chunin Exams.
Sen (セン, Sen) is a Chūnin from Sunagakure who teams with Shira and Yome.

Senji (戦時) is the former village chief of Takigakure and Hisen's assistant. He is also Shibuki's helper and only appeared in the light novel adaptation, Naruto: Mission: Protect the Waterfall Village!
Senta (センタ, Senta) is a loan shark for the Gang Akagi.
Sentoki (千时, Sentoki) is one of the young monks in training at the Fire Temple.
description.html: Sentoki (千時, Sentoki) is one of the young ninja monks-in-training at the Fire Temple.

description.text: Setsuna (セツナ, Setsuna) was a Shinobi from the Land of Demons.
Setsuna Uchiha (うちはセツナ, Uchiha Setsuna) was a member of the Uchiha clan, during the reign of the Second Hokage. He was a member of the Konoha Military Police.
Shabadaba (シャバダバ, Shabadaba) was a former friend and minister of Kakeru Tsuki, King of the Country of the Moon.
description.html: Shabadaba (シャバダバ, Shabadaba) was the former minister and self-proclaimed king of Land of the Moon.

description.text: Shamon (沙門, Shamon) was the Second Kazekage (二代目风影, Nidaime Kazekage; meaning 'Second Wind Shadow') of Sunagakure.
Shiba (シバ, Shiba) is a ninken , and is one of Kakashi Hatake's summons.
Shiba (シバ, Shiba) was a Chūnin of Kusagakure.
description.html: Shiba (シバ, Shiba) was a chūnin from Kusagakure.

description.text: Shibi Aburame (油女シビ, Aburame Shibi ) is a jōnin-ranked ninja from Konohagakure, a member of the Aburame Clan, and father of Shino Aburame. He was the leader of the Jinchūriki Protection Division of the Great Shinobi Alliance.
Shibire (シビレ, Shibire) is a genin from Konohagakure who participated in the last Chūnin Exams.
description.html: Shibire (シビレ, Shibire) is a genin from Konohagakure.

description.text: Shibito Azuma (東シビト, Azuma Shibito) was a jōnin-level shinobi of Iwagakure.
description.html: Shibito Azuma (東シビト, Azuma Shibito) was a jōnin of Iwagakure.

description.text: Shibuki (飛沫, Shibuki) is a Chūnin of Takigakure and current leader of the same village after the death of his father.
Shigezane (シゲザネ, Shigezane) is a shinobi from Sunagakure belonging to the Hōki Family.
Shigure (シグレ, Shigure) was a Genin of Amegakure. He was also the leader of the Shigure team.
Shiho (シホ, Shiho) is a professional member who works in the Konoha Cryptanalysis Squad.
description.html: Shiho (シホ, Shiho) is a kunoichi from Konohagakure who works in the Konoha Cryptanalysis Team.

description.text: Shiin (死韻, Shiin) was the leader of a group of bandits originating from the Land of Rice Fields, the same where the Hidden Sound Village is currently.
Shijima (シジマ, Shijima) is a kunoichi from Sunagakure and a member of the Hōki family. She is Hakuto's bodyguard and his older sister. However, she is not the successor of the Clan.
Shikadai Nara (奈良シカダイ, Nara Shikadai) is a Chūnin of Konohagakure member and heir of the Nara Clan. He is part of Team Moegi alongside Inojin Yamanaka and Chōchō Akimichi.

Shikaku Nara (奈良シカク, Nara Shikaku) was the Jōnin Commander of Konohagakure. He along with Chōza Akimichi and Inoichi Yamanaka formed a generation of the Ino-Shika-Chō Formation. He was a member of the Nara Clan and mastered Shadow Imitation techniques, as well as having an intelligence comparable to or greater than that of his son, Shikamaru Nara. He was married to Yoshino Nara. He was the chief strategist of the Grand Shinobi Alliance.

Shikamaru Nara (奈良シカマル, Nara Shikamaru) is a Konoha ninja who belongs to the Nara Clan. He was a member of Team Asuma along with his teammates Chōji Akimichi and Ino Yamanaka. He married Temari and had a son named Shikadai Nara. Shikamaru was the deputy commander of the Fourth Division of the Grand Shinobi Alliance during the Fourth Shinobi World War.
Shikazō (鹿蔵, Shikazō) was Tsukado's uncle.
description.html: Shikazo was a distant relative of Tsukado that Kageki accidentally killed.

description.text: Shikuro Aburame (油女シクロ, Aburame Shikuro) was a shinobi of Konohagakure and father of Torune Aburame.
Shima (シマ, Shima) is one of the Two Great Wise Toads along with her husband Fukasaku, which has the ability to use the energy of nature.
Shimeji (しめじ, Shimeji) is a gardener who is said to be able to make a garden out of barren land. He is Buna's teacher, and works in the cities near Tanzaku Barracks.
description.html: Shimeji (しめじ, Shimeji) is a talented gardener who works in various towns surrounding Tanzaku Quarters. He is said to be able to make a garden even out of a barren wasteland.

description.text: Shimon Hijiri (聖シモン, Hijiri Shimon) is a Chūnin of Konohagakure, a member of the Interrogation and Torture Force of Konoha.
Shin (シン, Shin) was a former ANBU of the Konoha Root organization and was also Sai's adoptive brother.

Shin Uchiha (うちはシン, Uchiha Shin) was a shinobi who was once a follower of Orochimaru and his test subject for genetics experimentation. Shin was trying to revive Akatsuki and return conflict to the world so that humans can evolve through it. Despite his last name, he was not actually a member of the Uchiha Clan.
Shin'emon is a world-famous potter who is obsessed with his work.
Shinayakana (しなやかな) was a bandit along with his brother.
description.html: Shinayakana (しなやかな, Shinayakana) was a bandit alongside his brother.

description.text: Shinga (シンガ, Shinga) was the main antagonist in Naruto Shippūden: Ultimate Ninja Heroes 3.
The Shinigami (死神, Shinigami; literally 'God of Death') is a spiritual entity summoned through the Consuming Seal of the Death Demon.
Shinki (シンキ, Shinki) is a Genin of Sunagakure member of Team Shinki. He is the adopted son of Gaara, the Fifth Kazekage.
Shinko Inari (稲荷シンコ, Inari Shinko) is a former partner of Itachi Uchiha and Tenma Izumo, she was a member of Team 2 and currently works as a waitress. .
description.html: Shinko Inari (稲荷シンコ, Inari Shinko) is a former kunoichi of Konohagakure.

description.text: Shinku Yūhi (夕日真紅, Yūhi Shinku) was the father of Kurenai Yūhi was a shinobi from Konoha, who was present during the Kurama attack and possibly died in that attack.
Shinnō (新野, Shinnō) was the main villain in Naruto Shippūden the Movie: Ties, he was Amaru's sensei.

Shino Aburame (油女シノ, Aburame Shino) is a Jōnin of Konohagakure and member of the Aburame Clan, famous for its use of Kikaichū, He was part of Team Kurenai, along with his teammates Kiba Inuzuka and Hinata Hyūga. During the Fourth World War Shinobi was part of the Fifth Division. He currently serves as a teacher at the Ninja Academy. ) is a small citizen of Konoha.
Shinobu Mibu (壬生シノブ, Mibu Shinobu) es un shinobi de nivel Chūnin de Konoha.
Shinta (シンタ, Shinta) es un pequeño ciudadano de Konoha.
description.html: Shinta (シンタ, Shinta) is a young citizen of Konohagakure.

description.text: Shio (塩, Shio) is a Genin from Konohagakure., forming a team with Satō and Koshō.
description.html: Shio (塩, Shio) is a genin of Konohagakure, forming a team with Satō and Koshō.

description.text: Shion (紫苑, Shion) is the High Priestess of Demon Country and the protagonist of Naruto Shippūden: The Movie.
Shiore (シオレ, Shiore) was a Genin of Kusagakure.
description.html: Shiore (シオレ, Shiore) was a genin from Kusagakure.

description.text: Shira (シラ, Shira) is a Chūnin from Sunagakure who teams up with Sen and Yome.
Shiranami Tsuchigumo (シラナミ, Tsuchigumo Shiranami) is the head of Magaki's group and a former member of the Clan. Tsuchigumo, whose goal is to obtain the clan's forbidden jutsu.
Shiro (シロ, Shiro) was a dog and the pet of Indra and Asura Ōtsutsuki. He is also the pet of Itachi and Sasuke in the novel written by Jiraiya in Tsunade's dream.
description.html: Shiro (シロ, Shiro) is a dog from Jiraiya's novel, who appears within Tsunade's dream world as Sasuke and Itachi Uchiha's pet.

description.text: Shiro (シロ, Shiro) was a dog from the Land of the Ancestors and pet of Asura and Indra Ōtsutsuki.
description.html: Shiro (シロ, Shiro) was a dog from the Land of Ancestors and a pet of Asura and Indra Ōtsutsuki.

description.text: Shiromari (史郎マリ, Shiromari) is a summoned chameleon that takes the form of a castle. It is similar to Iwagama (of Mount Myōbokuzan). It was summoned more than fifty years before Naruto visited Kubisaki Castle with Hinata Hyūga and Kiba Inuzuka.
description.html: Shiromari is a chameleon summon that took the form of a castle and the personal summon of Kōza Kubisaki.

description.text: Shiseru (シセル, Shiseru) is the leader of the Hachō Security Squad.
Shishio (シシオ, Shishio) is a Genin of Sunagakure who teams with Ameno and Kōji.
Shisui Uchiha (うちはシスイ, Uchiha Shisui) was a shinobi of Konohagakure, best friend of Itachi Uchiha and one of the most talented shinobi of his clan and Konoha.
Shisō (シソウ) is a ninja from Hoshigakure. He and Yotaka are assistants to the substitute Hoshikage Akahoshi.
Shitō Akimichi (秋道シトウ, Akimichi Shitō) is one of the members of the Akimichi Clan.
Shizuka (シズカ, Shizuka) is a kunoichi and leader of Nadeshiko Village. She was destined to fight with Jiraiya's student in order to marry, as it was a law of the village.
Shizuku (シズク, Shizuku) was a kunoichi from the Demon Country and was part of the Gang of Four. She was one of the antagonists in Naruto Shippūden: The Movie.
Shizuku (シズク, Shizuku) is a citizen of Takigakure.
description.html: Shizuku (シズク, Shizuku) is a citizen from Takigakure.

description.text: Shizuma Hoshigaki (干柿屍澄真, Hoshigaki Shizuma) is a Kirigakure shinobi member of the Hoshigaki Clan and the leader of the New: Seven Ninja Swordsmen.

Shizune (シズネ, Shizune) is a medical ninja and Jōnin trained by Tsunade. She is the niece of Dan Katō, Tsunade's late boyfriend. She almost always hangs out with Tsunade's pet pig, Tonton. She was the leader of the Medical and Logistics Support Division of the Grand Shinobi Alliance. Shizune served as an assistant to the Fifth, Sixth, and Seventh Hokage.
Shojoji (ショジョジ, Shojoji) is a renegade ninja leader of the Mujina Bandits.

Shukaku (守鶴, Shukaku), also known as the One-Tail (一尾, Ichibi), is one of the Tailed Beasts created by the Sage of the Six Paths and a beast that has been sealed within three jinchūriki throughout its existence. , with Gaara, the Fifth Kazekage of Sunagakure, being the most recent.
Shun (シュン, Shun) is a ninja from Konohagakure who was part of the Second Division of the Great Shinobi Alliance during the Fourth Shinobi World War.
description.html: Shun (シュン, Shun) is a shinobi from Konohagakure.

description.text: Shura (修羅) He was the acting leader of the Shinobazu criminal group. Shū (シュウ, Shū) is a cat that belongs to the owner of the inn where Naruto and Jiraiya stayed when they went to look for Tsunade.
Shōseki (ショウセキ, Shōseki) es un ciudadano de Konoha el es el aprendiz de fabricante de armas Iō.
description.html: Shōseki (ショウセキ, Shōseki) is a citizen of Konohagakure and the apprentice of weapon maker Iō.

description.text: Shū (シュウ, Shū) es un gato que pertenece al dueño de la posada en donde se hospedaron Naruto y Jiraiya cuando fueron a buscar a Tsunade.
description.html: Shū (シュウ, Shū) belongs to the owner of a motel where Naruto and Jiraiya stay during their search for Tsunade.

description.text: Shū (シュウ, Shū) is the son of the daimyō from the Country of Ese, near the Country of Fire.
description.html: Shū (シュウ, Shū) is the son of the daimyō of the Land of That, a country near the Land of Fire.

description.text: He was the captain of the army of the Country of Sky and led the attack against Konoha, and if Shinnō was absent, he acted as acting leader.
Son Gokū (孫悟空, Son Gokū) or his full name Son Gokū Seiten Taisei (孫悟空斉天大聖, Son Gokū Seiten Taisei), also known as the Four Tails (四尾, Yonbi) is a Beast with Tail sealed in Rōshi of Iwagakure.
Sora (ソラ, Sora) is a Ninja Monk in training at the Fire Temple, and was also the Pseudo-Jinchūriki of Kurama.

Sora (ソラ, Sora) is a girl who lived in Tonika Village before it was attacked. During its destruction, she was rescued by Dokku along with Faz and Lando, before leaving her house and meeting Leo and Miina on the way to Hacho Village.
description.html: Sora (ソラ, Sora) is a young girl from the Tonika Village.

description.text: The Daimyō of the Land of Fields of Rice is the Daimyō of the Country of Rice Fields, better known as the Country of Sound.
description.html: He is the daimyō of the Land of Rice Fields, otherwise known as the Land of Sound.

description.text: The Beast Spirit (霊獣, Reijū) was an ancient demon sealed many centuries ago and who was attempted release by Genshō Ryūdōin. He is the final boss of the video game Naruto: Path of the Ninja 2.
description.html: The Spirit Beast was an ancient demon that was sealed away long ago. Genshō Ryūdōin attempted to revive this beast.

description.text: He is the bricklayer who sculpts the faces of the Hokages on the Hokage Rock.
description.html: He is the mason who carves the faces of Hokage on the Hokage Rock.

description.text: He is the assistant of the Konoha Stone Sculptor.
description.html: He is the assistant of a stone carver.

description.text: Suguro (スグロ, Suguro) is a thief who was part of Jakō's gang.
description.html: Suguro (スグロ, Suguro) is a thief that was part of Jako's gang.

description.text: Suien (水煙, Suien) was a renegade ninja from Takigakure.

Suigetsu Hōzuki (鬼灯水月, Hōzuki Suigetsu) is a shinobi from Kirigakure who was known in his village for his multiple cold-blooded murders, which made him known as the Second Coming of the Demon (鬼人の再来, Kijin no Sairai), he was later captured by Orochimaru and later freed by Sasuke when he defeated the Sannin, and was the first member to join Sasuke Uchiha's Taka (formerly Hebi) team.
Suika was a jōnin-ranked shinobi of Takigakure before his desertion from the village. He then began to operate as a bandit.
Suika Kannonji (観音寺スイカ, Kannonji Suika) is a resident of Konohagakure and one of the quest givers.
description.html: Suika Kannonji (観音寺スイカ, Kannonji Suika) is a citizen of Konohagakure who works at the Mission Assignment Desk.

description.text: Suiko (水虎, Suiko) was a ninja from Takumi Village and a member of the Four Men of the Celestial Symbols.
Suiren (スイレン, Suiren) is a Chūnin from Amegakure who teamed with Ajisai and Fuyō.
Suiren (スイレン, Suiren) was a kunoichi from Kirigakure who died to protect Ganryū.
description.html: Suiren (スイレン, Suiren) was a kunoichi of Kirigakure.

description.text: Suiu (スイウ, Suiu) is a genin from Amegakure who participated in the Chūnin Exams.
Sukeza (スケザ) is a miner from the Katabami Gold Mine.
description.html: Sukeza (スケザ, Sukeza) is a miner from Katabami Gold Mine.

description.text: Sukima (スキマ, Sukima) is a shinobi from Genin level of Konohagakure.
description.html: Sukima (スキマ, Sukima) is a genin of Konohagakure.

description.text: Sukui (スクイ, Sukui) is a Medical Ninja of Konohagakure who was part of the Medical and Logistics Support Division during the Fourth Shinobi World War.
Sukune (スクネ, Sukune) was Tanishi's father and Yone's husband. He met and befriended Jiraiya.
Sumaru (スマル) is a filler character. He is the strongest Genin of Hoshigakure and his dream is to be Hoshikage.

He was also the younger brother of Hashirama Senju and great-uncle of Tsunade and Nawaki. He was resurrected twice by Orochimaru. description.text: Tsukino (野月,Tsukino), también conocida como la kunoichi enmascarada(マスクくノ一, kunoichi Masuku) es una kunoichi de Tsukigakure y su líder que aparece en el videojuego Naruto Shippūden: Ultimate Ninja Héroes 3 que fue controlada por Shinga.
He was Tsukino's father and former leader of Tsukigakure.
description.html: He was Tsukino's father and the former village head of Tsukigakure.

description.text: Tsukune (ツクネ, Tsukune) is a student at Konohagakure Academy.
description.html: Tsukune (ツクネ, Tsukune) is an academy student from Konohagakure.

description.text: Tsukushi (ツクシ, Tsukushi) was a prisoner of Orochimaru's northern lair.
description.html: Tsukushi (ツクシ, Tsukushi) was a prisoner at Orochimaru's Northern Hideout.

description.text: Tsume Inuzuka (犬塚ツメ, Inuzuka Tsume) is a Tokubetsu Jōnin-ranked kunoichi from Konohagakure. She is a member of the Inuzuka Clan and the mother of Hana and Kiba Inuzuka. Like the rest of her Clan, she has as partner a Ninken named Kuromaru.

Tsunade (綱手, Tsunade) is one of the legendary Sannin along with Orochimaru and Jiraiya, being also known for being one of the strongest kunoichis and the best Medical Ninja in the world. world. She became the Fifth Hokage (五代目火影, Godaime Hokage, meaning Fifth Shadow of Fire), after Hiruzen Sarutobi died at the hands of Orochimaru. Additionally, she was a mentor to Shizune, Sakura Haruno and Ino Yamanaka.
Tsunami (ツナミ, Tsunami) is the daughter of Tazuna and mother of Inari.
description.html: Tsunami (ツナミ, Tsunami) is a citizen of the Land of Waves.

description.text: Tsuru Itoi (糸井つる, Itoi Tsuru) is a Genin from Konohagakure. He is part of Team 40 along with Enko Onikuma and Dōshu Goetsu.
Tsurugi (ツルギ, Tsurugi) was an ANBU from the Village Hidden in the Mist and leader of the team to capture Utakata.
Tsurushi Hachiya (蜂谷釣糸, Hachiya Tsurushi) is a shinobi of Kirigakure.
Tsuyu is a fictional character serving the Shuku village from the novel 'The Tale of the Utterly Gutsy Shinobi' written by Jiraiya.
description.html: Tsuyu is a fictional character in service to Shuku Village from The Tale of the Utterly Gutsy Shinobi novel written by Jiraiya. She is featured as the novel's main heroine and main supporting character to Naruto Musasabi. She also appears to be written as Naruto's love interest for the novel.

description.text: Tsuzumi (ツヅミ, Tsuzumi) is a police captain from the Land of Forests.
description.html: Tsuzumi (ツヅミ, Tsuzumi) is a police captain from the Land of Forests.

description.text: Tsuzumi Sarugaku (申楽ツヅミ, Sarugaku Tsuzumi) is a chūnin of Konohagakure.
description.html: Tsuzumi Sarugaku (申楽ツヅミ, Sarugaku Tsuzumi) is a chūnin of Konohagakure.

description.text: Tōbei Kagetsu (花月藤平, Kagetsu Tōbei) is a medicinal herb seller from the Motoyoshi villages who faked his own death.
description.html: Tōbei Kagetsu (花月藤平, Kagetsu Tōbei) is an medicinal herb salesman from Motoyoshi Village who faked his own death.

description.text: Tōfu (豆腐, Tōfu) is a self-proclaimed former bandit.
Tōjūrō (トウジュウロウ, Tōjūrō) is a high-ranking member of Sunagakure, who is known as the second in the Suna Council just after of Ebizō.
Tōka Senju (千手桃華, Senju Tōka) was a member of the Senju Clan in the time before Konoha was founded.
description.html: Tōka Senju (千手桃華, Senju Tōka) was a kunoichi of the Senju clan prior to the founding of the hidden villages.

description.text: Tōu (トウウ, Tōu) was once a member of the 12 Ninja Guardians and apparently the only female member.
Ubau (ウバウ, Ubau) is a pirate and the leader of the Gang of the Path of Silence.

Udon Ise (伊勢ウドン, Ise Udon) is a shinobi from Konohagakure. He was part of Team Ebisu alongside Konohamaru and Moegi. Currently, in the anime, is the leader of Team 5 consisting of Metal, Iwabee and Denki.
Ugai (ウガイ, Ugai) is a Medical Ninja from Konohagakure.
description.html: Ugai (ウガイ, Ugai) is a medical-nin of Konohagakure.

description.text: Ugatsu (ウガツ, Ugatsu ) was a shinobi expert in infiltration. As a holdover from former Amegakure loyal to Hanzō, he infiltrated the village again to try to kill Pain, where he was presumably killed in the attempt.
description.html: Ugatsu (ウガツ, Ugatsu) was a shinobi from Amegakure.

description.text: The Ultimate Ultimate Summon Beast (究極の口寄せ獣, Kyūkyoku no Kuchiyosejū) was a creature created from the combination of several genetically altered animals, and was made to be the best summon ever seen.

Umibōzu (海坊主, literally Sea Monk) is a creature summoned by Amachi to terrorize the Country of the Sea. This summoning at first glance is a mass of gelatinous water, that is why it does not have a specific shape and thanks to this he can change shape.
Unagi (ウナギ, Unagi) is a student at Konohagakure Academy.
description.html: Unagi (ウナギ, Unagi) is a former academy student of Konohagakure.

description.text: Unkai Kurama (鞍马云海, Kurama Unkai) is the uncle of Yakumo Kurama, and a family member of the Kurama Clan branch.
Unmo Samidare (五月雨ウンモ, Samidare Unmo) was a jōnin of Kirigakure.
description.html: Unmo Samidare (五月雨ウンモ, Samidare Unmo) was a jōnin from Kirigakure.

description.text: Urakaku (ウラカク, Urakaku ) is a samurai who, with Okisuke, is Mifune's bodyguard during the Kage meeting.
Urashiki Ōtsutsuki (大筒木ウラシキ, Ōtsutsuki Urashiki) was a member of the main family of the Ōtsutsuki Clan. His main role is to gather information as an investigator for the Ōtsutsuki clan.
Uroko Kurama (鞍馬ウロコ, Kurama Uroko) was a member of the main branch of the Kurama clan. She was the wife of Murakumo Kurama and the mother of Yakumo Kurama.
description.html: Uroko Kurama (鞍馬ウロコ, Kurama Uroko) was a member of the main branch of the Kurama clan. She was also the wife of Murakumo Kurama and the mother of Yakumo Kurama.

description.text: Uruchi Uchiha (うちはウルチ, Uchiha Uruchi) was the wife of Teyaki Uchiha, and used to own a small bakery in the Uchiha compound in Konoha.
description.html: Uruchi Uchiha (うちはウルチ, Uchiha Uruchi) was a citizen of Konohagakure and a member of the Uchiha clan.

description.text: Urushi (ウルシ, Urushi) is one of the many orphans who lived in the Fire Country Orphanage. He later became a shinobi of Konohagakure.
description.html: Urushi (ウルシ, Urushi) is an orphaned child who lived in the Konoha Orphanage. He later became a shinobi of Konohagakure.

description.text: Urushi (ウルシ) is a ninken, and is a summon of Kakashi Hatake.

Ushi (ウシ literally 'The Cow') ') was a member of the ANBU, working directly under the supervision of the Second Hokage. He was one of the ANBU who was ordered to watch over the Uchiha clan to prevent them from rebelling again. Ushi is probably not his real name, but a code name.
description.html: Ushi (ウシ, Ushi) was an Anbu member of Konohagakure who served under the Second Hokage.

description.text: Utakata (ウタカタ Utakata) was a shinobi of Kirigakure and the last Jinchūriki of Saiken. He was captured by Akatsuki and died after the Six-Tails were extracted from his body. In the anime, he was a renegade ninja, who left his village after he killed his master by transforming into the Six-Tails. He was revived by Kabuto Yakushi to fight as one of Tobi's Six Paths of Pain in the Fourth Shinobi World War.
Uō (ウオウ, Uō) is a Chūnin inhabitant of Konohagakure.
He is the chief of an unknown village that is terrorized by Baji and his gang of thieves.
description.html: He is the headman of an unknown village that was being terrorised by Baji and his gang of bandits.

description.text: Waraji (ワラジ, Waraji) is a mercenary hired by Gatō to be his bodyguard, He is Zōri's partner.
Wasabi Izuno (伊豆野ワサビ, Izuno Wasabi) is a Chūnin from Konohagakure. He is part of Team 15 along with Sumire Kakei and Namida Suzumeno.
Watase (ワタセ, Watase) is a genin-level ninja from Konoha.
description.html: Watase (ワタセ, Watase) is a genin from Konohagakure.

description.text: The Daimyō of the Country of Water is the leader of the Country of Water.
description.html: He is the daimyō of the Land of Water.

description.text: The Sage of the White Snake (白蛇仙人, Hakuja Sennin) is the leader of the Snakes who resides in Ryūchi Cave.

White Zetsu (白ゼツ, Shiro-Zetsu) was one of the first humans affected by the Infinite Tsukuyomi who were inside the Demonic Statue of the Outer Path, until when Madara Uchiha finally managed to summon it, he was taken out of the statue by the Black Zetsu and influenced by the DNA of Hashirama Senju.
This Daimyō was the leader of the Country of the Wind.
description.html: He is the former daimyō of the Land of Wind (風の国の大名, Kaze no Kuni no Daimyō).

description.text: The Second Daimyō of the Country of the Wind is the current feudal lord of the Land of the Wind, who replaced the First Daimyō in Part II of the series.
description.html: He is the current daimyō of the Land of Wind, replacing the former wind daimyō.

description.text: Ya (ヤ, Ya) is a shinobi of Kemurigakure belonging to the Moya Brothers.
description.html: Ya (ヤ, Ya) is a member of the Moya Triad.

description.text: Yagura (やぐら, Yagura) was a ninja from Konohagakure who was to be trained by Might Guy.
description.html: Yagura (ヤグラ, Yagura) was a genin from Konohagakure that Might Guy was going to train.

description.text: Yagura Karatachi (枸橘やぐら, Karatachi Yagura) was the last jinchūriki of Isobu and the Fourth Mizukage (四代目水影, Yondaime Mizukage, literally 'Fourth Shadow of Water'). His reign was characterized by being one of blood and terror that contributed to Kirigakure being known as the 'Village of the Blood Mist'. He was revived by Kabuto during the Fourth Shinobi World War.

Yahiko (弥彦, Yahiko) was the founder of the Akatsuki organization and belonged to the Orphans of the Rain, along with Nagato and Konan, who were trained by Jiraiya shortly after the Second Shinobi World War. After his death, Nagato used Yahiko's body to be the Deva Path of the Six Paths of Pain.
Yajirobee (ヤジロベエ, Yajirobee) is a chūnin-ranked ninja from Konohagakure.
Yakku (ヤック, Yakku) is a genin-ranked shinobi from Sunagakure.
description.html: Yakku (ヤック, Yakku) is a genin from Sunagakure.

description.text: Yakumi Uchiha (うちはヤクミ, Uchiha Yakumi) was a member of the Uchiha Clan during the years preceding the Uchiha Clan Massacre.
description.html: Yakumi Uchiha (うちはヤクミ, Uchiha Yakumi) was a member of Konohagakure's Uchiha clan and the Konoha Military Police Force.

description.text: Yakumo Kurama (鞍馬八雲, Kurama Yakumo) is the last survivor of the main family of the Kurama Clan and therefore its heir.
description.html: Yakumo Kurama (鞍馬八雲, Kurama Yakumo) is the last surviving member of the main branch of the Kurama clan, and, as such, the heiress to the clan.

description.text: Yamame (ヤマメ, Yamame) was a renegade ninja from Kirigakure who appeared in Naruto: Crossed Paths, she was a member of Team Kajika.
Yamaoka (ヤマオカ, Yamaoka) was an employee of the Fire Country Daimyō, Ikkyū Madoka.
description.html: Yamaoka (ヤマオカ, Yamaoka) was a vassal of the Land of Fire's daimyō, Ikkyū Madoka.

description.text: Yamato (ヤマト Yamato) is a member of ANBU, and a ninja from Konohagakure of the same rank as Kakashi Hatake. He appears during the second part of the anime. In addition, he was the temporary leader of Team 7. His real name is unknown, during his stay in Root he was known as Kinoe (甲), He later adopted the name Tenzō (テンゾウ) and was finally given his current codename (Yamato) by Tsunade.
Yaoki (ヤオキ, Yaoki) is a ninja from Sunagakure.
Yashamaru (夜叉丸, Yashamaru) was an ANBU who was under the direct orders of the Fourth Kazekage and who possessed skills in medical ninjutsu.
Yashiro Uchiha (うちはヤシロ, Uchiha Yashiro) was a Shinobi member of the Uchiha Clan and the Military Police of the Hidden Leaf Village. Chūnin.
description.html: Yashiro Uchiha (うちはヤシロ, Uchiha Yashiro) was a member of the Uchiha clan and the Konoha Military Police Force.

description.text: Yatogo Ryūgen (りゅうげんヤトゴレ, Ryūgen Yatogo) es un shinobi de Konohagakure, de rango Chūnin.
description.html: Yatogo Ryūgen (りゅうげんヤトゴ, Ryūgen Yatogo) is a chūnin of Konohagakure.

description.text: Yodo (ヨド, Yodo) is a Sunagakure Genin member of Team Shinki.
Yokaze (ヨカゼ, Yokaze) is a Konoha Medical Ninja who trained part of the Medical and Logistics Support Division during the Fourth Shinobi World War
Yokozuna (横綱, Yokozuna) is the highest rank in sumo. His name comes from the most visible symbol of his rank, the wide belt (yoko) or rope (tsuna) that he wears around his waist.
description.html: Yokozuna (ヨコズナ, Yokozuna) is the leader of the Sumo Wrestlers.

description.text: Yome (ヨメ, Yome) is a Chūnin from Sunagakure who teams with Shira and Sen.
Yomi (黄泉, Yomi) was a shinobi specialized in ninjutsu doctors from the Land of Demons who appeared in Naruto Shippūden: The Movie.

Yomito Hirasaka (比良坂ヨミト, Hirasaka Yomito). He is a Shinobi from Yumegakure and a member of the Hirasaka Clan. Appears in the video game Naruto Shippūden Kizuna Drive. Akadō Yoroi) was a Konoha genin who participated in the Chūnin Exams, secretly being a subordinate of Orochimaru.
Yone (ヨネ, Yone) es la esposa de Sukune y madre de Tanishi.
description.html: Yone (ヨネ, Yone) is a villager of the Genjutsu Tree Village.

description.text: Yoroi Akado (赤胴ヨロイ, Akadō Yoroi) era un genin de Konoha que participó en los Exámenes Chūnin, siendo, en secreto, un subordinado de Orochimaru.
Yoshino Nara (奈良ヨシノ, Nara Yoshino) is Shikamaru's mother and Shikaku's widow. In the anime, she is part of the Allied Mothers Force team.
Yoshiteru (ヨシテル, Yoshiteru) is one of the Samurai of the Country of Iron.
Yota (ヨタ, Yota) was a small boy from an unknown land with a strange ability to control the weather. He was resurrected by Kabuto Yakushi for the Fourth Shinobi World War.
Yotaka (ヨタカ, Yotaka) is a ninja from Hoshigakure. He and Shisō are assistants to the substitute Hoshikage Akahoshi.

Yugito Nii (二位ユギト, Nii Yugito) was a jōnin of Kumogakure and was the last jinchūriki of Matatabi. She was captured by Hidan and Kakuzu and later resurrected by Kabuto during the Fourth Shinobi World War.
Yui (ユイ, Yui) is a traveler who usually visits hot springs.
description.html: Yui (ユイ, Yui) is a citizen from the Land of Fire.

description.text: Yukai (ユカイ, Yukai) is a shinobi from Kumogakure and leader of the Thundercloud Unit.
Yukata (ユカタ, Yukata) is a young kunoichi from Sunagakure. He participated in the Konohagakure and Sunagakure Chūnin Exams and later entered the Great Shinobi Alliance.
description.html: Yukata (ユカタ, Yukata) is a young kunoichi from Sunagakure. She is part of a genin group alongside Matsuri and Mikoshi.

description.text: Yuki is a student at the Konohagakure academy who appears in Naruto Shippūden: Ultimate Ninja Storm 4.
description.html: Yuki is an academy student of Konohagakure who appears in Naruto Shippūden: Ultimate Ninja Storm 4.

description.text: Yukimi (ユキミ, Yukimi) is a girl who is part of the Iburi Clan.
description.html: Yukimi (ユキミ, Yukimi) is a young girl and the last living member of the Iburi clan.

description.text: Yurika (ユリカ, Yurika) is a kunoichi from Konohagakure and a member of the Cryptanalysis Squad of Konoha.
description.html: Yurika (ユリカ, Yurika) is a Konohagakure kunoichi and a member of the Konoha Cryptology Team.

description.text: Yurinojō (Yurinojō) is a ninja from the Country of Vegetables, personal escort of the leader of that country.
Yurito (ユリト, Yurito) is a shinobi of Konohagakure.
description.html: Yurito (ユリト, Yurito) is a shinobi of Konohagakure.

description.text: Yurui (ユルイ, Yurui) is a Genin of Kumogakure and a member of Team Yurui.
Yurui (ユルイ, Yurui) was a Chūnin-level shinobi of Kumogakure.
description.html: Yurui (ユルイ, Yurui) was a Kumogakure shinobi.

description.text: Yōji Aburame (油女ヨウジ, Aburame Yōji) was a shinobi of Konohagakure, a member of the Aburame Clan. After entering Root, Yōji occasionally bore the name Sugaru (スガル).
Yōrō (ヨウロウ, Yōrō) is a Jōnin of Takigakure.
Yūdachi (ユウダチ, Yūdachi) is a Genin of Amegakure.
description.html: Yūdachi (ユウダチ, Yūdachi) is a genin from Amegakure.

description.text: Yūgao Uzuki (卯月夕颜, Uzuki Yūgao) is a kunoichi from Konohagakure who was part of the ANBU.
Yūki Minazuki (結城水無月 Minazuki Yūki) was the leader of Team 2.
description.html: Yūki Minazuki (水無月ユウキ, Minazuki Yūki) is a jōnin from Konohagakure and the former leader of Team 2.

description.text: Yūkimaru (幽鬼丸, Yūkimaru) is a young orphan who, after the death of his mother, began to be part of the experiments of Orochimaru.
She was Yūkimaru's mother. She said that she would protect Yūkimaru no matter what, with all her heart.
Yūra (由良, Yūra) was a jōnin-rank shinobi who was part of the Suna Council under the Fifth Kazekage, Gaara.
description.html: Yūra (由良, Yūra) was a jōnin from Sunagakure. He was also a sleeper agent of Sasori.

description.text: Yūsuke (祐介, Yūsuke) is a fisherman who wanted to avenge his father for a monstrous fish that lives near the port of the Fire Country.
description.html: Yūsuke (ユウスケ, Yūsuke) is a fisherman in the Land of Fire.

description.text: He was Yūsuke's father before he died in an attempt to catch the Giant Marlin.
description.html: He was a fisherman from the Land of Fire and the father of Yūsuke.

description.text: Yūto (勇人, Yūto) was the son of Malice who appeared in Naruto Shippūden 3D: The New Era.
description.html: Yūto was the son of Malice that appeared in Naruto Shippūden 3D: The New Era.

description.text: Zabuza Momochi (桃地再不斬, Momochi Zabuza) was a renegade ninja from Kirigakure and a member of the Seven Ninja Swordsmen of the Mist, and the first main antagonist of the series.
Zaji (ザジ, Zaji) is a Sensor ninja from Konohagakure who is part of the Surprise Attack Division.
Zaji (ざじ, Zaji) is the brother of the gambler Sōzu and lives in his game room at Tanzaku Barracks.
description.html: Zaji (ザジ, Zaji) is a gambler from the Land of Fire.

description.text: Zaku Abumi (ザク・アブミ, Zaku Abumi) was a genin of Otogakure's Dosu Team who participated in the Chūnin Exams and the Invasion of Konoha.
Zangei (ザンゲイ, Zangei) was a master bounty exchanger in Fire Country.
description.html: Zangei (ザンゲイ, Zangei) was a bounty exchange master who ran one of the Land of Fire Bounty Stations.

description.text: Zenza (禅座, Zenza) is one of the young monks in training at the Fire Temple.
description.html: Zenza (禅座, Zenza) is one of the young ninja monks-in-training at the Fire Temple.

description.text: Zero-Tails (零尾, Reibi) is a malevolent spirit, created by the dark thoughts and feelings of the oppressed people, sealed within the Country of Heaven.
See also: Tobi (Zetsu) and White Zetsu Army
description.html: See also: Tobi (Zetsu) and White Zetsu Army

description.text: Zō (ゾウ, Zō) is one of the ANBU captains of Konohagakure.
Zōri (ゾウリ, Zōri) is a mercenary hired by Gatō to be his bodyguard, he is Waraji's partner
Zōsui (ゾウスイ, Zōsui) is a high-ranking shinobi of Kusagakure.
description.html: Zōsui (ゾウスイ, Zōsui) is a high-ranking shinobi from Kusagakure.

description.text: Ōkei (オウケイ, Ōkei) is a chūnin-level shinobi of Konohagakure.
description.html: Ōkei (オウケイ, Ōkei) is a chūnin of Konohagakure.

description.text: Ōmitsu (オオミツ) is Komitsu's older brother.
description.html: Ōmitsu (オオミツ) is the older brother of Komitsu.

description.text: Ōnoki (オオノキ, Ōnoki) was a shinobi of Iwagakure and was its Third Tsuchikage (三代目土影, Sandaime Tsuchikage; literally 'Third Shadow of the Earth').
Otora (大虎, Ōtora) was a villager from Sunagakure, who commonly walked around drunk with a bottle in his hand.
description.html: Ōtora (大虎, Ōtora) was a drunk villager who would always wander around Sunagakure with a bottle in his hand.

description.text: The Patriarch of the Ōtsutsuki Clan was a member of the main branch of the Ōtsutsuki Clan. He lived long enough to give information about the Power Vessel, the Tenseigan, and the history of his clan to Naruto Uzumaki and Hinata Hyūga shortly before his death.
description.html: He was a head of the Ōtsutsuki clan's main family on the Moon.

description.text: Ōwashi (オオワシ, Ōwashi) was the Daimyō of the Land of Birds.
description.html: Ōwashi (オオワシ, Ōwashi) was the daimyō of the Land of Birds.
